original: 'on kyang rang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye ba'i grogs su bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid yin pas de bas na ma 'khrul pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye ba'i grogs su bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid yin pas de bas na ma 'khrul pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: But since it is the very thing that assists in the production of a consciousness that has its aspect, therefore it is taught that it is non-erroneous.

original: spyi yang rang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir rten la rag lus pa de ltar gsal bya yin par 'dod pa de bas na /
analyzed: spyi yang rang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa bskyed pa'i phyir rten la rag lus pa de ltar gsal bya yin par 'dod pa de bas na /
translated: Since a universal is also asserted to be a manifestor that depends on its basis in order to generate a consciousness that has its aspect,

original: des rten las bdag dmigs su rung ba thob par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des rten las bdag dmigs su rung ba thob par bya ba yin no //
translated: therefore it is to be obtained that the self is observed in dependence on that basis.

original: bdag nyid thob pa 'di ni spyi gang las kyang yod pa ma yin te rtag pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid thob pa 'di ni spyi gang las kyang yod pa ma yin te rtag pa nyid du khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This self that is obtained does not exist in any universal because it is accepted as permanent.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: â€œ Thatâ€ refers to a universal.

original: pha rol pos ni spyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: pha rol pos ni spyi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: The opponent says, â€œA universal,â€ and so on.

original: rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba gsal bar smra ba'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba gsal bar smra ba'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: â€œ It is a manifestor that is in contact with its basisâ€ should be applied.

original: gal te rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba ji ltar gsal ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba ji ltar gsal ba yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked how a universal that is in contact with its basis is a manifestor,

original: rang gi rten la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: rang gi rten la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: The master [DignÄga] states, â€œHere, the universal is not the cause of the cognition of itself or another.â€

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: Here means in the present context.

original: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni rang gi rten la'o //
analyzed: gzhan la zhes bya ba ni rang gi rten la'o //
translated: Another means oneâ€™s own basis.

original: slob dpon gyis 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis 'dir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The master [DignÄga] states, â€œHere, the universal is not the cause of the cognition of itself or another.â€

original: phan 'dogs par mi byed pa'i rten de nyid 'dir bsam par bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: phan 'dogs par mi byed pa'i rten de nyid 'dir bsam par bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The very basis that does not assist is what is to be considered here, and so on.ğŸ”½The universal that is a thing that depends on the contact of its own basis is the cause of the arising of consciousness in itself or another.

original: rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du bas 'brel pa de ni bdag nyid dam gzhan la rnam par shes pa skye ba'i rgyu yin no zhes smra bas rang gi rten gyi 'du ba 'phrod pa la ltos pa spyi dngos po ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin parğŸ”½'dod pa de bas na /
analyzed: rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du bas 'brel pa de ni bdag nyid dam gzhan la rnam par shes pa skye ba'i rgyu yin no zhes smra bas rang gi rten gyi 'du ba 'phrod pa la ltos pa spyi dngos po ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin par 'dod pa de bas na /
translated: Thus the universal that is a thing that depends on the contact of its own basis is asserted to be the cause of consciousness.

original: rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba des spyi ni bdag nyid skyed par byed pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba des spyi ni bdag nyid skyed par byed pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the universal that is the contact of its own basis would be the cause of the arising of itself alone.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu de ste shes pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo rang gi rten la 'phrod pa dang 'du ba las snga na med pa'i phyir dang / rang gi rten la 'phrod pa dang 'du ba de las rnam par shes pa rgyu'i ngo bo yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu de ste shes pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo rang gi rten la 'phrod pa dang 'du ba las snga na med pa'i phyir dang / rang gi rten la 'phrod pa dang 'du ba de las rnam par shes pa rgyu'i ngo bo yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause, i.e., the nature of the cause, does not exist prior to the contact and union with its basis, and because consciousness exists as the nature of the cause from that contact and union with its basis.

original: gal te spyi ni rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te spyi ni rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rtag pa yin te /
translated: If you say that the universal is permanent because it is the nature of the production of consciousness,

original: de ma grub pa yin no zhe na de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de ma grub pa yin no zhe na de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: we reply: that nature, etc.

original: de'i ngo bo yod pa yin na zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i ngo bo yod pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo yod pa yin na zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i ngo bo yod pa yin na'o //
translated: If the nature of the production of consciousness exists,

original: sngar yang @175b zhes bya ba ni rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba las te gsal bas stong pa'i yul la yang spyi 'ba' zhig las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sngar yang @175b zhes bya ba ni rang gi rten la 'phrod pa 'du ba las te gsal bas stong pa'i yul la yang spyi 'ba' zhig las zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: then previously, i.e., prior to the contact and union with its basis, the universal would exist alone, i.e., without the particular, in the object devoid of manifestation.

original: spyi'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa skye bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa skye bar thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that consciousness would have the aspect of the universal.

original: gsal ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pha rol po'i yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni pha rol po'i yin te /
translated: The opponentâ€™s response is stated in the lines beginning â€œThe universal is not manifest.â€

original: gsal ba ni rten no //
analyzed: gsal ba ni rten no //
translated: The universal is the basis.

original: spyi legs par byas pa ni rung ba nyid du byed pa ste /
analyzed: spyi legs par byas pa ni rung ba nyid du byed pa ste /
translated: The proper action is the action that is suitable.

original: gtan tshigs de'i phyir spyi ni gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa gang yin pa des spyi bskyed par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs de'i phyir spyi ni gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa gang yin pa des spyi bskyed par bya ba yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: The reason is that, because the universal is not manifest, it must be generated by that which manifests it.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: de 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni spyi 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ni spyi 'dzin pa ste /
translated: The line â€œThe universal is apprehended by thatâ€ means that the universal is apprehended by the proper action.

original: legs par byas pas gsal bar byed pa ni zhes bya ba'i skabs yin no //
analyzed: legs par byas pas gsal bar byed pa ni zhes bya ba'i skabs yin no //
translated: The context is that the proper action is the action that manifests the universal.

original: slob dpon gyis de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: The master Ä€ryadeva states the following:ğŸ”½The universal is not manifest, like eye medicine, etc.

original: mig sman sogs bzhin zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe yin te /
analyzed: mig sman sogs bzhin zhes bya ba ni chos mi mthun pa'i dpe yin te /
translated: This is an example of a dissimilar case.

original: ji ltar mig sman la sogs pa las dbang po legs par byas pa rigs pa yin pa de ltar gsal ba la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar mig sman la sogs pa las dbang po legs par byas pa rigs pa yin pa de ltar gsal ba la ni ma yin no //
translated: Just as it is reasonable that the sense faculty is properly acted upon by eye medicine, etc., it is not reasonable that the universal is manifested by the manifestation of the individual.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni gsal bar byed pa nyid du 'dod pas gsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ni gsal bar byed pa nyid du 'dod pas gsal bar bya'o //
translated: Because the universal is asserted to be that which manifests, it must be manifested.

original: de yod med pa'i dus rtag tu //
analyzed: de yod med pa'i dus rtag tu //
translated: At all times, whether it exists or not,

original: zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'i tshig gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bdun pa'i tshig gnyis pa'o //
translated: This is the second part of the seventh verse.

original: rtogs pa ni shes pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa ni shes pa'o //
translated: Realization is knowledge.

original: mig sman la sogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: mig sman la sogs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'chad par byed de /
translated: The phrase â€œby means of eye-salve, etc.â€ is explained as follows.

original: mig sman la sogs pas dbang po legs par byas pas bdag du gyur pa 'ga' zhig zhig khyad par du thob par byed do //
analyzed: mig sman la sogs pas dbang po legs par byas pas bdag du gyur pa 'ga' zhig zhig khyad par du thob par byed do //
translated: By means of eye-salve, etc., one who has a good faculty, i.e., one who has a good eye, obtains a special realization.

original: rtogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because of realization.

original: rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan dang shes pa khyad par can bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan dang shes pa khyad par can bskyed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Because of the generation of a special knowledge which has realization as its objective support.

original: las dang 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
analyzed: las dang 'brel pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis //
translated: By means of the objective support which is related to action,

original: zhes bya ba 'dir bdun pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dir bdun pa yin te /
translated: Here the seventh case is used.

original: 'di ltar rtogs pa rgyu mtshan du gyur pa dang / phul du byung ba las su gyur pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rtogs pa rgyu mtshan du gyur pa dang / phul du byung ba las su gyur pa'i rgyu 'bras kyi 'brel pa yod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, realization is the objective support and the supreme is the action. There is a relation of cause and effect between them.

original: gal te de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na gsal ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te de nyid ci'i phyir zhe na gsal ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: If one asks, â€œWhy is that?â€ the answer is â€œbecause of clarity, etc.â€

original: rtogs pa'i zhes bya bar rnam par dbye ba bsgyur nas sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: rtogs pa'i zhes bya bar rnam par dbye ba bsgyur nas sbyar ba'o //
translated: The word â€œrealizedâ€ should be supplied in the above verse.

original: de ltar na dbang po rab rib la sogs pas nyams par byas pas rnam par shes pa mi gsal ba skyed par byed de /
analyzed: de ltar na dbang po rab rib la sogs pas nyams par byas pas rnam par shes pa mi gsal ba skyed par byed de /
translated: Thus, the eye sense faculty, impaired by cataracts, etc., produces a consciousness that is unclear.

original: de nyid mig sman la sogs pas @176a * //ğŸ”½legs par byas na gsal por gyur par shes pa de bas na /
analyzed: de nyid mig sman la sogs pas @176a * // legs par byas na gsal por gyur par shes pa de bas na /
translated: When the eye sense faculty is well-prepared by collyrium, etc.,ğŸ”½it produces a clear consciousness.

original: dbang po legs par byas pas rtogs pa'i don du phul du byung ba thob par byed do zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po legs par byas pas rtogs pa'i don du phul du byung ba thob par byed do zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the eye sense faculty, when well-prepared, produces a superior realization.

original: gang gi tshe mig sman la sogs pas rtogs pa khyad par med pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mig sman la sogs pas rtogs pa khyad par med pa de'i tshe /
translated: When the eye sense faculty is not well-prepared by collyrium, etc.,ğŸ”½it does not produce a superior realization.

original: de mi byed pa yang ste rtogs pa tha dad pa med na yang mig sman la sogs pa ni de nyid dbang po legs par byas pa legs par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mi byed pa yang ste rtogs pa tha dad pa med na yang mig sman la sogs pa ni de nyid dbang po legs par byas pa legs par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though there is no difference in the realization, collyrium, etc., do not make the eye sense faculty well-prepared.

original: ji ltar mig sman la sogs pas dbang po legs par byas pa de ltar gsal ba las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar mig sman la sogs pas dbang po legs par byas pa de ltar gsal ba las ni ma yin no //
translated: The eye sense faculty is well-prepared by collyrium, etc., but not by clarity.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de yod pa dang med pa'i dus rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de yod pa dang med pa'i dus rtag tu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: â€œAt all times, whether it exists or notâ€ and so on.

original: gal te sngar de med pa'i dus su shing la sogs pa dag la rnam par shes pa mi gsal ba skye zhing /
analyzed: gal te sngar de med pa'i dus su shing la sogs pa dag la rnam par shes pa mi gsal ba skye zhing /
translated: If you think that previously, when the cow was not nearby, consciousness arose unclearly with respect to the tree and so on,

original: phyis gsal ba ba lang nye ba na gsal ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: phyis gsal ba ba lang nye ba na gsal ba de'i tshe /
translated: and later, when the cow was nearby, it arose clearly,

original: dbang po legs par byas pa gsal bar byas pa yin par rtogs na /
analyzed: dbang po legs par byas pa gsal bar byas pa yin par rtogs na /
translated: and you understand that the sense faculty was improved and made clear,

original: ji ltar gsal ba ba lang gsal bar byed pa yod pa'i dus na /ğŸ”½shing las ci 'dra bar skye ba de ni med pa na shing la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar gsal ba ba lang gsal bar byed pa yod pa'i dus na / shing las ci 'dra bar skye ba de ni med pa na shing la sogs pa la /
translated: then how is it that when the clear cow is made clear,ğŸ”½consciousness arises in the same way as it did previously with respect to the tree and so on?

original: de kho na 'dra ba skye ba yin no //
analyzed: de kho na 'dra ba skye ba yin no //
translated: When it does not exist, consciousness arises in exactly the same way with respect to the tree and so on.

original: gal te yul legs par byas pa yod na yang yul gzhan du rtogs pa'i khyad par yod pa ma yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: gal te yul legs par byas pa yod na yang yul gzhan du rtogs pa'i khyad par yod pa ma yin pa de bas na /
translated: If you say that even if the object is improved, the difference in the cognition of the object does not exist elsewhere,

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then that also is illogical.

original: yul zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: yul zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: â€œThe objectâ€ and so on.

original: dri la sogs pa'i yul 'ga' zhig gis legs par byas pa gang yin pa des dbang po khyad par du byed pa yang /
analyzed: dri la sogs pa'i yul 'ga' zhig gis legs par byas pa gang yin pa des dbang po khyad par du byed pa yang /
translated: Some objects such as smells and so on, which are the proper objects of the sense faculties, are well formed and they enhance the sense faculties.ğŸ”½Even though the sense faculties do not enhance the sense faculties in other objects, they are enhanced because they are enhanced by their objects.ğŸ”½The sense faculties are enhanced because their objects are enhanced.ğŸ”½The sense faculties that are enhanced are not enhanced by the objects.ğŸ”½The sense faculties that are enhanced are not enhanced by the objects.

original: gzhan du yul gzhan la dbang po rtogs pa la gal te khyad par yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang de khyad par du byas pa'i phyir te /ğŸ”½yul so sor nges pa de yang khyad par du byas pa'i phyir phan 'dogs par 'gyur te /ğŸ”½gsal bar byas pa'i dbang po legs par byas pa ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan du yul gzhan la dbang po rtogs pa la gal te khyad par yod pa ma yin pa de lta na yang de khyad par du byas pa'i phyir te / yul so sor nges pa de yang khyad par du byas pa'i phyir phan 'dogs par 'gyur te / gsal bar byas pa'i dbang po legs par byas pa ni phan 'dogs par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

original: de skad du so sor nges pa'i yul de dag ni rang gi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa sgrub par byed kyi rnam pa gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: de skad du so sor nges pa'i yul de dag ni rang gi rnam pa can gyi rnam par shes pa sgrub par byed kyi rnam pa gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin pa de bas na /
translated: The sense faculties that are enhanced are not enhanced by the objects.ğŸ”½The sense faculties that are enhanced are not enhanced

original: yul legs par byas pas ni so sor nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi yul @176b kho na rtogs pa khyad par can kho na skyed par byed pa yin pas 'gal ba med la /
analyzed: yul legs par byas pas ni so sor nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi yul @176b kho na rtogs pa khyad par can kho na skyed par byed pa yin pas 'gal ba med la /
translated: Since the object is well activated, it is ascertained individually. Therefore, since it generates only a special consciousness that comprehends its own object, there is no contradiction.

original: dbang po ni rang gis gzung bar bya ba'i yul gyi khyad par 'dra ba sgrub par byed pa de bas na /
analyzed: dbang po ni rang gis gzung bar bya ba'i yul gyi khyad par 'dra ba sgrub par byed pa de bas na /
translated: Since the sense faculty establishes a similar specific object that it apprehends,

original: de legs par byas pa ni de'i gzung bar bya ba thams cad la rtogs pa khyad par med pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½gal te gsal ba'i khyad par gyi dbang pos gzung bar bya ba mthong ba'i yul thams cad la shes pa'i rnam pa gsal bar bskyed pa'i phyir dbang po legs par byas pa byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang gsal ba skye ba las sngar spyi ma mthong
analyzed: de legs par byas pa ni de'i gzung bar bya ba thams cad la rtogs pa khyad par med pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro // gal te gsal ba'i khyad par gyi dbang pos gzung bar bya ba mthong ba'i yul thams cad la shes pa'i rnam pa gsal bar bskyed pa'i phyir dbang po legs par byas pa byed pa ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang gsal ba skye ba las sngar spyi ma mthong
translated: it is said that when it is well activated, it obtains a special consciousness that comprehends all objects that it apprehends.ğŸ”½If the sense faculty that is a special clarity generates a clear aspect of consciousness in all objects that are seen, then the sense faculty is not activated by well activating it.

original: ba dbang po'i mthong ba'i nus pa byed pa ste /
analyzed: ba dbang po'i mthong ba'i nus pa byed pa ste /
translated: However, prior to the generation of clarity, the unseen generality is seen by the sense faculty and the capacity of seeing is activated.

original: bya ba'i phyir gsal ba'i khyad par gyis phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bya ba'i phyir gsal ba'i khyad par gyis phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: and the specific activity of the sense faculty assists it.

original: dbang po las 'das pa mthong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa mthong ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen to transcend the sense faculty.

original: dbang po legs par byas pa gsal por shes te /
analyzed: dbang po legs par byas pa gsal por shes te /
translated: The sense faculty is well-formed and clearly cognizes.

original: gsal ba nye ba las gong du nus pa med pa yin la /
analyzed: gsal ba nye ba las gong du nus pa med pa yin la /
translated: When the clear object is near, it has no capacity to cognize.

original: phyis nye ba na nus pa de lta na gsal ba'i khyad par de ni dbang po las 'das pa spyi zhes bya ba'i don mthong bas ji ltar rtogs pa thams cad du khyad par med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyis nye ba na nus pa de lta na gsal ba'i khyad par de ni dbang po las 'das pa spyi zhes bya ba'i don mthong bas ji ltar rtogs pa thams cad du khyad par med par 'gyur te /
translated: Later, when it is near, it has that capacity. In that case, since that specific clarity sees the object called the universal, how could it be realized without distinction in all cases?

original: khyad par can kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par can kho nar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It would be only in the specific case.

original: 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is taught as follows:

original: de khas @177a * //

analyzed: smras pa gcig kyang nges par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

analyzed: dbye ba med pa gsal ba de ni rang gi nyid kyi 'phrod pa 'du bas 'brel pa'i spyi de dag la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the manifestation, which is undifferentiated, is related to them, the universals, by the connection of inherence, and there is no difference among them.

original: de ni 'ga' zhig dang nye ba ma yin zhing 'ga' zhig dang ring ba yang ma yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: de ni 'ga' zhig dang nye ba ma yin zhing 'ga' zhig dang ring ba yang ma yin pa de bas na /

original: spyi thams cad ni nges pa'am /
analyzed: spyi thams cad ni nges pa'am /
translated: Therefore, all universals are either ascertained or not ascertained.

original: 'ga' zhig kyang nges par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig kyang nges par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ltar re zhig gsal bas dbang po legs par byas pa mi 'thad do zhes bstan nas /

translated: Now, in order to state that even if one accepts that,ğŸ”½if one says â€œthe clear,â€ it is not reasonable that the capacity of the nature of generating consciousness, which is the nature of generating consciousness in both cases,

analyzed: gsal bas phyogs gnyi ga la yang rnam par shes ba skye ba'i rang bzhin no zhes bya ba dbang du byas pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa bskyed pa'i rang bzhin las mi 'da' ba'i rgyu'i phyir nus pa ni lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa rigs pa ma
translated: is dependent on the cooperative condition, because it does not go beyond the nature of generating consciousness.

analyzed: yin no // spyi gang la dbang po legs par byas pa'i lhan cig byed pas yod pa de la de @177b skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which exists due to the cooperative condition of the sense faculty well-refined in the universal is called that.

analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni de nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir byed pa med pa phul du byung ba spyi 'di'i lhan cig byed pa'i don gang yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir byed pa med pa phul du byung ba spyi 'di'i lhan cig byed pa'i don gang yin te /

original: 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: 'ga' yang med do //

original: khyad par du byas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ldog pa bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: khyad par du byas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ldog pa bstan pa yin te /

analyzed: lhan cig byed pa las khyad par du byas pa'i bdag nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni lhan cig byed pa la'o //
translated: The phrase â€œin thatâ€ refers to the cooperating causes.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: skad cig ma de dag gis skyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid lhan cig byed pa nye ba las sngar med pa gang yin pa de'i tshe ste lhan cig byed pa de kho na las gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma de dag gis skyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid lhan cig byed pa nye ba las sngar med pa gang yin pa de'i tshe ste lhan cig byed pa de kho na las gyur pa'i phyir ro //

original: de dag nyid ni skad cig ma dag go //
analyzed: de dag nyid ni skad cig ma dag go //

analyzed: gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig byed pas so //
translated: The phrase â€œnot established by anotherâ€ means not by the cooperating causes.

original: rang bzhin de ni nus pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin de ni nus pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: That nature is the nature of the capacity.

original: spyi yan gar ba lhan cig byed pa dang bral ba de ni snga na rnam par shes pa'i skyed pa'i rang bzhin med par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ji ltar yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

translated: And that universal, which is devoid of a cooperative condition, would not be the nature of generating consciousness, which it was previously.

analyzed: rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bsams pa'o // gzhan yang gsal ba spyi legs par byas pa yod na des bskyed par bya ba yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ;
translated: How could it be otherwise? It is thought that it is permanent.ğŸ”½Moreover, if the universal is well-established, then it would be generated by that.

original: gzhan gyis dbang po legs par byas pa khas len na de lta na yang gsal bas bskyed par bya ba nyid thob pa'i phyir gsal bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: gzhan gyis dbang po legs par byas pa khas len na de lta na yang gsal bas bskyed par bya ba nyid thob pa'i phyir gsal bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: If you accept that the sense faculty is well-established by another, then even in that case, since it is obtained by being generated by the universal, he says â€œby the universal,â€ and so on.

original: de'i lhan cig byed pa can gyis zhes bya ba ni gsal bas dbang po legs par byas pa'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi spyi ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin pa de ltar khas len pa ni yang gsal ba'i 'bras bu dbang pa'i 'bras bu nyid yin
analyzed: de'i lhan cig byed pa can gyis zhes bya ba ni gsal bas dbang po legs par byas pa'i lhan cig byed pa can gyi spyi ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu yin pa de ltar khas len pa ni yang gsal ba'i 'bras bu dbang pa'i 'bras bu nyid yin
translated: â€œThe cause of the consciousness is the universal that is the co-existent cause of the sense faculty that is well-formed by the particularsâ€ means that the universal that is the co-existent cause of the sense faculty that is well-formed by the particulars is the cause of the consciousness.

analyzed: pa'i phyir spyi ni brgyud pas gsal ba'i 'bras bu nyid du bstan par 'gyur ro / // / bam po bcu bdun pa /
translated: In that case, the universal would be the indirect effect of the particulars, because it is the effect of the sense faculty, which is the effect of the particulars.

original: re zhig gsal ba ni spyi'i gsal bar byed pa yin kyang bla ste /
analyzed: re zhig gsal ba ni spyi'i gsal bar byed pa yin kyang bla ste /
translated: Even if the particulars were the manifestors of the universal,

analyzed: de ni rigs dang ldan pa nyid du rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: it would not be logical for them to possess the universal.

original: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir /ğŸ”½gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /ğŸ”½gal te rigs te spyi rnams dang / gsal @178a * //
analyzed: ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir / gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / gal te rigs te spyi rnams dang / gsal @178a * //
translated: Because that would lead to an absurd consequence.ğŸ”½Moreover, if the particulars were the manifestors of the universal,

analyzed: ba'i khyad par gsal bar byed pa ni rigs dang ldan pa nyid du 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: then the universal would not be a universal.

analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa sgron ma la sogs pa gsal bar byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because the lamp, etc. which illuminate the cow, etc. are the illuminators.

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa des de dang ldan pa ba lang nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa thob ste /
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa des de dang ldan pa ba lang nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa thob ste /
translated: Therefore, the cow, etc. obtain the possession of that, i.e., the possession of the cow, etc.

original: khra bo la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ba lang gi rten thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ba lang gi rten thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is like the variegated color, etc. and the cow, etc. are obtained as the basis. This is the meaning of the statement.

original: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains with â€œthat which,â€ etc.

original: ba lang nyid la sogs pa gsal bya dag la sgron ma la sogs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin no //
analyzed: ba lang nyid la sogs pa gsal bya dag la sgron ma la sogs pa la yang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin no //
translated: The lamp, etc. are the cause of consciousness in regard to the cow, etc. which are the objects of illumination.

original: gal te ji ltar zhe na snang bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /ğŸ”½de bas na snang ba la rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid du yod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te ji ltar zhe na snang bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / de bas na snang ba la rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid du yod pa yin no //
translated: If it is asked how, he says â€œbecause of appearance,â€ etc.ğŸ”½Therefore, the lamp exists as the cause of consciousness in regard to appearance.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: â€œThereforeâ€ means because of being the cause of consciousness.

original: sgron ma la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni dbang po dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa gzung ste /
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgras ni dbang po dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa gzung ste /
translated: The phrase â€œsuch things as lampsâ€ includes the sense faculties and attention, etc.

original: de dag kyang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are also causes of consciousness.

original: gal te gsal ba las spyi ni mngon par gsal ba khyad par can kho nar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba las spyi ni mngon par gsal ba khyad par can kho nar 'gyur gyi /
translated: If a universal is manifested from a particular, it would be manifested only as a specific particular.

original: sgron ma la sogs pa las ni de ltar ma yin no zhe na gsal ba las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pa las ni de ltar ma yin no zhe na gsal ba las kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: But that is not the case with lamps, etc.ğŸ”½If a universal is manifested from a particular, it would be manifested only as a specific particular.ğŸ”½But that is not the case with lamps, etc.ğŸ”½The phrase â€œfrom a particularâ€ refers to the cause of consciousness.

original: gsal ba las kyang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid ma gtogs pa gzhan mngon par gsal ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba las kyang rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid ma gtogs pa gzhan mngon par gsal ba 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Apart from that, nothing else is manifested.

original: gal te gsal ba spyi phul du byung bar byed pa byas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba spyi phul du byung bar byed pa byas pa yin gyi /
translated: If a particular is a universal that is made manifest,

original: sgron ma la sogs pas ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pas ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: then it is not made manifest by a lamp, etc.

original: khyad par yod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: khyad par yod par 'gyur na /
translated: In that case, there would be a difference between them.

original: de yang med de spyi phul du byung ba'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bya bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: de yang med de spyi phul du byung ba'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bya bar mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: But that is not so, because it is impossible for a universal to have a nature that is especially its own.

original: gal te 'phrod ba 'du ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal ba la 'phrod pa 'du bas 'brel pa ba lang nyid yin gyi sgron ma la sogs pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
analyzed: gal te 'phrod ba 'du ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal ba la 'phrod pa 'du bas 'brel pa ba lang nyid yin gyi sgron ma la sogs pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni spyi'o //
translated: If you say that the universal is related to the individual by the relation of inherence, etc.,

analyzed: bskyed par bya ba dang skyed par byed pa med pa dag la 'phrod pa 'du ba zhes bya ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes @178b bya ba bshad zin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: then what is this â€œinherenceâ€ that you speak of in regard to that which is not produced and that which does not produce?

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba yod pa de lta na yang spyi 'di ni gsal ba dang lhan cig 'phrod pa 'du ba tsam du skyes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba yod pa de lta na yang spyi 'di ni gsal ba dang lhan cig 'phrod pa 'du ba tsam du skyes pa yin gyi /
translated: Even if inherence does exist, this universal is produced merely by inhering in the individual,

original: gzhan rnam par shes pa'i bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan rnam par shes pa'i bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi khyad par 'ga' zhig kyang ma yin no //
translated: and not by any other special characteristic that is the cause of consciousness.

original: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dang 'phrod pa 'du ba las snga ma bzhin du'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gsal ba dang 'phrod pa 'du ba las snga ma bzhin du'o //
translated: â€œAs beforeâ€ means that the universal is like the prior manifestation of the object.

original: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba las 'phrod pa 'du ba la yang ngo //
analyzed: phyis kyang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba las 'phrod pa 'du ba la yang ngo //
translated: â€œAnd laterâ€ means that the universal is like the subsequent manifestation of the object.

original: gal te 'di ltar spyi ni khyad par 'ga' zhig kyang med pa de lta yang 'phrod pa 'du ba'i stobs las rang gi yul gyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa yin no zhe na /ğŸ”½'phrod pa 'du ba kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar spyi ni khyad par 'ga' zhig kyang med pa de lta yang 'phrod pa 'du ba'i stobs las rang gi yul gyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa yin no zhe na / 'phrod pa 'du ba kho na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Even though the universal does not exist in any particular, the consciousness of the universal arises from the power of the manifestation of the object.

original: spyi shes pa'i rgyu nyid du khas len na /ğŸ”½rang gi rten gang la 'phrod pa 'du bas 'brel pa de la spyi las gzhan 'phrod pa 'du ba dag kyang ste gzugs la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab la sogs pa 'phrod pa 'du ba 'brel ba dag kyang mthong bar thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: spyi shes pa'i rgyu nyid du khas len na / rang gi rten gang la 'phrod pa 'du bas 'brel pa de la spyi las gzhan 'phrod pa 'du ba dag kyang ste gzugs la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab la sogs pa 'phrod pa 'du ba 'brel ba dag kyang mthong bar thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If you accept that the universal is the cause of the cognition of the universal,

original: thams cad la 'phrod pa 'du ba ni gcig nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la 'phrod pa 'du ba ni gcig nyid du khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it follows, absurdly, that the particular, which is related to the universal by the relation of inherence, would also be seen as related to the universal by the relation of inherence, because the relation of inherence is the same in both cases.

original: ji ltar 'phrod pa 'du ba yan gar pas spyi dbang po las 'das pa yang mthong ba med pa ltar gzugs la sogs pa rdul phra rab dag kyang ci'i phyir mthong bar byed par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phrod pa 'du ba yan gar pas spyi dbang po las 'das pa yang mthong ba med pa ltar gzugs la sogs pa rdul phra rab dag kyang ci'i phyir mthong bar byed par mi 'gyur /
translated: Just as a single collection of atoms is not seen, why is a subtle atom not seen?

original: gang gi phyir 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyogs la skyon 'di yod pa de bas na gsal ba spyi'i yul la gsal bar byed pa nyid ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin no //ğŸ”½de lta bur gyur pa'i gsal bar byed pa de yang sgron ma la sogs pa dang yang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'phrod pa 'du ba'i phyogs la skyon 'di yod pa de bas na gsal ba spyi'i yul la gsal bar byed pa nyid ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin no // de lta bur gyur pa'i gsal bar byed pa de yang sgron ma la sogs pa dang yang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Since this fault exists in the position of a collection, the clarity of the object of a universal is the cause of consciousness.ğŸ”½That clarity is like a lamp, etc.

original: ba lang nyid sogs de ldan thob //
analyzed: ba lang nyid sogs de ldan thob //
translated: The consequence that â€œcow-nessâ€ and so on would be obtained

original: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba de nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i thal bar 'gyur ba de nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: would still apply.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½spyi rang gi rten la gnas pa ni rten ma yin zhing ;
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro // spyi rang gi rten la gnas pa ni rten ma yin zhing ;
translated: Therefore means for that reason.ğŸ”½A universal does not reside in its own basis,

original: spyi rang gi rten la gnas pa yang rang gi rten gyis gsal ba ste /
analyzed: spyi rang gi rten la gnas pa yang rang gi rten gyis gsal ba ste /
translated: and a universal that resides in its own basis is not clarified by its own basis.

original: mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa de bas na du ma byas pa la shes pa rnam pa gcig pa can gyi rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba ma yin pa de bas na du ma byas pa la shes pa rnam pa gcig pa can gyi rgyu ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, the many are not the cause of a cognition that has a single aspect, because they are not a basis.

original: mi gnas pa'i rgyu'i phyir /ğŸ”½gang zhig gang la mi gnas pa de ni de @179a * //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i rgyu'i phyir / gang zhig gang la mi gnas pa de ni de @179a * //
translated: Because they are not a basis.

original: la bdag nyid gnas pa'i sgo nas shes pa'i rgyur mi rigs so //
analyzed: la bdag nyid gnas pa'i sgo nas shes pa'i rgyur mi rigs so //
translated: That which is not a basis for something cannot be the cause of a cognition of that, because it does not exist in that.

original: du ma la spyi gcig mi gnas pa de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: du ma la spyi gcig mi gnas pa de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Because the universal does not exist in the many,

original: gal te rigs gsal ba las gzhan yin pa'am /ğŸ”½gzhan ma yin par smra ba gang yin pa de dag ni sngar ma byung ba'i phyir gsal ba ste /
analyzed: gal te rigs gsal ba las gzhan yin pa'am / gzhan ma yin par smra ba gang yin pa de dag ni sngar ma byung ba'i phyir gsal ba ste /
translated: if one says that it is either different or not different from the particulars,ğŸ”½then it is not tenable that the universal is the cause of a cognition that has its form, because it is not a basis.ğŸ”½The universal does not exist in the many, because it is not a basis.

original: da ltar byung ba'am phyis mthong bar 'gyur ba dag la'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'am phyis mthong bar 'gyur ba dag la'o //
translated: If one says that it is either different or not different from the particulars, then it is not tenable that the universal is the cause of a cognition that has its form, because it is not a basis.ğŸ”½The universal does not exist in the many, because it is not a basis.

original: de nyid kyi sgra ni yod pa'i sgra'i 'og tu nges par gzung ba'i 'og tu blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi sgra ni yod pa'i sgra'i 'og tu nges par gzung ba'i 'og tu blta bar bya'o //
translated: The word â€œjustâ€ should be understood to be a definite marker that follows the word â€œexists.â€

original: de nyid kyi phyir yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir yod pa kho na'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, â€œit exists, etc.â€

original: gang dag gi rigs ni don dam par yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gang dag gi rigs ni don dam par yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that the universal exists ultimately.

original: rang gi nus pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi rtogs pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rang gi nus pa nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi rtogs pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: â€œBy its own powerâ€ means by its own realization.

original: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i khyad par la blo skyed par byed pa na'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i khyad par la blo skyed par byed pa na'o //
translated: â€œBy anotherâ€ means by the production of an awareness in regard to a particular manifestation.

original: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What kind of particularity?

original: rang gi ngo bo rjes su byed pa can te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo rjes su byed pa can te /
translated: It is that which conforms to its own nature.

original: ngo bo gcig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o ;
analyzed: ngo bo gcig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o ;
translated: It is that which is included in the same nature.

original: / gang la blo skyed par byed pa der 'brel pa rag lus pa yin te /
analyzed: / gang la blo skyed par byed pa der 'brel pa rag lus pa yin te /
translated: The production of an awareness in regard to that is dependent upon the relation.

original: 'brel pa med par ni rang gi rnam pa can gyi blo bskyed par ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med par ni rang gi rnam pa can gyi blo bskyed par ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: For if there were no relation, it would follow, absurdly, that an awareness with that form would be produced.

original: de yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba ni gsal ba gzhan dang 'brel pa ste /
translated: â€œThatâ€ refers to the relation with another manifestation.

original: spyi ni de nyid kyi phyogs dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni de nyid kyi phyogs dang gzhan nyid kyi phyogs la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The universal does not exist in the place of that, nor in another place.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gsal ba'i khyad par gcig la skye ba'i blo gcig tu 'byung ba can de ni /
analyzed: gsal ba'i khyad par gcig la skye ba'i blo gcig tu 'byung ba can de ni /
translated: The awareness that arises in regard to one particular manifestation is produced as one.

original: gsal ba gzhan la yang spyi'i rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan la yang spyi'i rnam par 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it would also be apprehended in other instances of the manifestation.

original: gal te gsal ba'i khyad par gcig po de la spyi don dam par gyur pa cung zhig mthong na /
analyzed: gal te gsal ba'i khyad par gcig po de la spyi don dam par gyur pa cung zhig mthong na /
translated: If one sees even the slightest bit of a real universal in that single instance of the manifestation,

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba gsal ba'i khyad par gang la des 'gro bar bya ba gzhan du mthong ba de yang yod pa zhes bya ba spyi dngos por gyur pa ni mi srid do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba gsal ba'i khyad par gang la des 'gro bar bya ba gzhan du mthong ba de yang yod pa zhes bya ba spyi dngos por gyur pa ni mi srid do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: then it would be impossible for the other instances of the manifestation, which are seen in other places, to be real universals.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rten las gzhan nyid min par khas blangs pa na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rten las gzhan nyid min par khas blangs pa na rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because if one accepts that it is not different from the basis, then it would not be a universal.

original: gcig las ldog pa med par de'i bdag nyid du 'gro ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gcig las ldog pa med par de'i bdag nyid du 'gro ba med pa'o //
translated: Because it would not be different from the one, it would not be a universal.

original: spyi rten las gzhan nyid yin na yang gsal ba la mi rten pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: spyi rten las gzhan nyid yin na yang gsal ba la mi rten pa'i phyir te /
translated: Even if the universal were different from the basis, it would not be supported by the manifestation,

original: rten ni brten pa la sogs pa'i dngos po dgag pa bshad ma @179b thag pas bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rten ni brten pa la sogs pa'i dngos po dgag pa bshad ma @179b thag pas bkag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the basis would be refuted by the refutation of the entity that is the support and so on, which was just explained.

original: gal te spyi tha dad pas 'brel pa med pas gsal ba gzhan la /
analyzed: gal te spyi tha dad pas 'brel pa med pas gsal ba gzhan la /
translated: If they are related by a different universal, then the particular is related to another.ğŸ”½

original: rang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed par mi byed pa de ltar gsal ba dang po la yang de mtshungs pa'i phyir /ğŸ”½sngon min gsal ba dag la ni //
analyzed: rang gi rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed par mi byed pa de ltar gsal ba dang po la yang de mtshungs pa'i phyir / sngon min gsal ba dag la ni //
translated: If the generality does not generate a consciousness that has its aspect in another instance because it is not related to it by way of being different, then it is the same for the first instance.

original: zhes ci'i phyir brjod de /
analyzed: zhes ci'i phyir brjod de /
translated: Why does he say, â€œIt is not seen in the first instanceâ€?

original: gsal ba dag la ni zhes brjod par bya'o //ğŸ”½de bzhin du gcig la yod pa ma mthong na ni /ğŸ”½gzhan la mthong ba mi srid phyir //
analyzed: gsal ba dag la ni zhes brjod par bya'o // de bzhin du gcig la yod pa ma mthong na ni / gzhan la mthong ba mi srid phyir //
translated: He should say, â€œIt is not seen in the instances.â€

original: zhes bya ba yang brjod par mi bya ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba yang brjod par mi bya ste /
translated: Similarly, he should not say, â€œBecause it is impossible to see it in another if it is not seen in one,â€

original: gsal ba'i khyad par gcig la yang 'brel pa med pa mthong ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba'i khyad par gcig la yang 'brel pa med pa mthong ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is impossible to see that which is not related to a particular instance.

original: de ni bden te khas blangs pas //
analyzed: de ni bden te khas blangs pas //
translated: That is true, but we accept it.

original: de skad du bshad pa'i phyir nyes pa med pa'o //ğŸ”½de ltar spyi de nyid dang gzhan nyid la gzhan du mthong ba mi srid cing /
analyzed: de skad du bshad pa'i phyir nyes pa med pa'o // de ltar spyi de nyid dang gzhan nyid la gzhan du mthong ba mi srid cing /
translated: There is no fault in explaining it in that way.ğŸ”½Thus, it is impossible to see the generality as different from itself and as different from others.

original: de nyid las rnam pa gzhan du yang mi srid par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid las rnam pa gzhan du yang mi srid par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: It is also impossible to see it as different from itself.ğŸ”½To explain this, he says:

original: rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: â€œThat very nature, etc.â€

original: rang bzhin gyi las de nyid dam gzhan nyid 'das pa ma yin zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi las de nyid dam gzhan nyid 'das pa ma yin zhes sbyar ro //
translated: That very nature of action is not beyond being the same or different.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ngo bo ste rang bzhin der gyur pa ma yin zhing de'i ngo bo ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ngo bo ste rang bzhin der gyur pa ma yin zhing de'i ngo bo ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that which is not of that nature, not of that essence, is not beyond being different.

original: de las gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de las gzhan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Because it is different from that, is the meaning.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin kyang bla ste /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin kyang bla ste /
translated: Even if it is not of that nature,

original: ci'i phyir gzhan nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir gzhan nyid yin zhe na /
translated: why is it different?

original: de'i phyir gzugs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa las /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa las /
translated: Therefore, â€œform, etc.â€

original: gang yin pa de nyid ma yin te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang yin pa de nyid ma yin te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: That which is not that very thing

original: de'i ngo bo ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: means that it is not of that nature.

original: 'di tsam kho na'i gzhan nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'di tsam kho na'i gzhan nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the definition of difference.ğŸ”½Like another aspect, etc.

original: rnam pa gzhan bzhin du zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i don gyi 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan bzhin du zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i don gyi 'dra ba'o //
translated: means like a sixth case similarity.

original: 'di ltar bde ba las sdug bsngal nyid gzhan yin pa yang sdug bsngal ni bde ba'i ngo bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar bde ba las sdug bsngal nyid gzhan yin pa yang sdug bsngal ni bde ba'i ngo bo ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Thus, suffering is different from pleasure itself, because suffering is not the nature of pleasure.

original: 'di tsam gyi ni de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gzhan nyid kyi khyad par bstan to //
analyzed: 'di tsam gyi ni de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gzhan nyid kyi khyad par bstan to //
translated: This much is the teaching of the difference of being different from that nature.

original: gzhan nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di yang mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir khyad par yang mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir khyad par stan to //
analyzed: gzhan nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di yang mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir khyad par yang mngon par 'dod pa'i phyir khyad par stan to //
translated: Since the characteristic of difference is accepted, the difference is taught because the difference is accepted.

original: sbyor ba ni dngos po nyid du yod pa de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa @180a * //
analyzed: sbyor ba ni dngos po nyid du yod pa de'i ngo bo ma yin pa gang yin pa @180a * //
translated: The application is: that which exists as a thing but is not of the nature of that

original: de ni de las gzhan nyid yin te /
analyzed: de ni de las gzhan nyid yin te /
translated: is different from it,

original: dper na bde ba las sdug bsngal ba lta bu'o //ğŸ”½dngos po nyid du yod pa'i spyi yang gsal ba'i ngo bo ma yin par 'dod do zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
analyzed: dper na bde ba las sdug bsngal ba lta bu'o // dngos po nyid du yod pa'i spyi yang gsal ba'i ngo bo ma yin par 'dod do zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin te /
translated: for example, like suffering from pleasure.ğŸ”½The universal that exists as a thing is also accepted as not being of the nature of the manifestation. This is a natural inference,

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pas gzhan nyid kyi tha snyad bya ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pas gzhan nyid kyi tha snyad bya ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the expression â€œdifferentâ€ is to be established by not being of its nature.

original: de ltar re zhig spyi de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid du bsgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar re zhig spyi de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid du bsgrub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, at first, the non-entityness of that universal is established as otherness.

original: 'on te gzhan nyid du mi 'dod pa de'i tshe de nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan nyid du mi 'dod pa de'i tshe de nyid thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: But if otherness is not accepted, then it is established as identity.

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To demonstrate this, he says,

original: gsal ba las gzhan nyid du ma yin na gsal ba'i ngo bo de nyid spyi de nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal ba las gzhan nyid du ma yin na gsal ba'i ngo bo de nyid spyi de nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: â€œIf it is not other than the particulars, then the nature of the particulars would be the universal.â€

original: de nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'o /
analyzed: de nyid ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gsal ba ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'o /
translated: â€œNot that very sameâ€ means not the nature of the particulars.

original: dngos po gzhan dang 'dra bar gzhan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de yang bshad ma thag pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: dngos po gzhan dang 'dra bar gzhan nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de yang bshad ma thag pa kho na yin no //
translated: â€œBecause it would follow that it would be other than the entityâ€ has just been explained.

original: spyi gzhan nyid ma yin pa de lta na yang gsal ba gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta na /
analyzed: spyi gzhan nyid ma yin pa de lta na yang gsal ba gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de lta na /
translated: Even though the universal is not other, the particulars would not be pervaded by it.

original: gsal ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i rang bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To demonstrate this, he says,ğŸ”½â€œIf the universal is not other than the particulars, then the particulars would not be pervaded by the universal.â€

original: gsal ba'i rang bzhin gcig ni gsal ba gzhan la rjes su 'gro zhing rjes su 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i rang bzhin gcig ni gsal ba gzhan la rjes su 'gro zhing rjes su 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: The nature of one manifestation does not follow after or enter into another manifestation.

original: gsal ba gzhan gyi rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan gyi rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the nature of another manifestation.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rjes su 'gro bar bya ba gsal ba gzhan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½gal te khra bo'i bdag nyid can gyi spyi ser skya'i bdag nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe ;
analyzed: rjes su 'gro bar bya ba gsal ba gzhan nyid med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // gal te khra bo'i bdag nyid can gyi spyi ser skya'i bdag nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe ;
translated: Because it would follow that the manifestation that is to be followed after would not be another.ğŸ”½If the universal that has the nature of being variegated were to become the nature of Kapila,

original: khra bo'i bdag nyid can gyi las tha dad pa med pa'i ser skya'i khra mo kho nar gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: khra bo'i bdag nyid can gyi las tha dad pa med pa'i ser skya'i khra mo kho nar gyur pa yin no //
translated: then the variegated manifestation would not be different from Kapila, and it would be just Kapila that is variegated.

original: khra bo dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba 'di ci'i phyir gsal ba gzhan nyid yin /
analyzed: khra bo dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba 'di ci'i phyir gsal ba gzhan nyid yin /
translated: Why is it that this is not like the variegated?

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir spyi tha dad pa med pa las zhes bya ba ni gsal ba las so //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir spyi tha dad pa med pa las zhes bya ba ni gsal ba las so //
translated: Therefore, because the universal is not different,

original: rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rjes su zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rjes su zhugs pa ste /
translated: it does not follow after the manifestation.

original: spyi tha dad pa med pa las kyang blo rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba'i skabs yin no //
analyzed: spyi tha dad pa med pa las kyang blo rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing zhes bya ba'i skabs yin no //
translated: And it is also not tenable that cognition would conform to a universal that is not different from the particulars.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi tha dad pa de ni gsal ba khyab pa 'ga' zhig la yang rten pa med cing gnas pa med @180b pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: spyi tha dad pa de ni gsal ba khyab pa 'ga' zhig la yang rten pa med cing gnas pa med @180b pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that universal that is not different from the particulars does not exist and is not based on any manifest entity that pervades it.

original: 'brel pa med par gnas par mi rung ba'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½gnas pa rten dang gsal ba ni //
analyzed: 'brel pa med par gnas par mi rung ba'i phyir ro // gnas pa rten dang gsal ba ni //
translated: Because it is not tenable that it exists without a relation.ğŸ”½The universal does not exist in the particulars,

original: de ltar de la mi rigs so //
analyzed: de ltar de la mi rigs so //
translated: Nor do the particulars exist in the universal.

translated: That does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir smras pa sbyor ba btags pa des ni gtso bo'i 'bras bu nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po 'di gdon mi za bar med na mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir smras pa sbyor ba btags pa des ni gtso bo'i 'bras bu nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po 'di gdon mi za bar med na mi 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir /

analyzed: gtso bo'i 'bras bu ma yin par 'dod pa las tha dad par 'dod pa yin /

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /

translated: he says â€œIf, etc. â€

analyzed: ji ltar spyi'i blo 'khrul pa yin pa bzhin du de lta bur gyur pa tha dad pa 'di ni don dang ldan pa ma yin te /

analyzed: des ji ltar tha dad pa med pa'i rnam par sgro btags pa'i phyi rol dag la med pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de bas na med pa 'dzin pa'i phyir bslad pa kho na te /

analyzed: gal te spyi'i blo thams cad 'khrul pa kho na yin na'o na ji ltar rjes su dpag pa don la mi bslu ba yin zhe na /

analyzed: de'i dngos po med du zin kyang rtags kyi rjes su 'brang zhing brgyud pas yod pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de yang phyis bstan par bya ba dang sngar yod pa dang med pa rjes su byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin to //
translated: Moreover, that is explained by â€œthat will be taught laterâ€ and â€œit follows after what existed previously and what does not exist.â€

original: gal te spyi'i blo yul med pa can 'di ci ltar gzhan sel ba'i yul can nyid bstan ce na /ğŸ”½de'i phyir tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

translated: Because the mind engages the imagined permanent self and so on that are the main object of the view of the self, they are called subjects that possess different objects.

translated: is not reasonable as something that possesses a substance that is in a different place from its support.

original: gzugs brnyan ni yul tha dad pa can gyi me long dang 'brel pa yin no zhes smras pas ji ltar na 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ni yul tha dad pa can gyi me long dang 'brel pa yin no zhes smras pas ji ltar na 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro /
translated: You have stated that a reflection is related to a mirror that is in a different place. How can you avoid error?

original: de la tshogs pa'i stobs las skyes pa'i me long la snang ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi rjes su 'gro ba can gyi shes pa 'khrul pa yin te /
analyzed: de la tshogs pa'i stobs las skyes pa'i me long la snang ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi rjes su 'gro ba can gyi shes pa 'khrul pa yin te /
translated: The consciousness that is concomitant with the reflection of a form that arises from the power of the assembly is mistaken.

original: rdo rje me long dkyil la sogs //
analyzed: rdo rje me long dkyil la sogs //
translated: The vajra statement that refutes arising from other is:

original: 'gal ba yi ni dbyibs can la //ğŸ”½ri bo la sogs dngos po yi //
analyzed: 'gal ba yi ni dbyibs can la // ri bo la sogs dngos po yi //
translated: In the case of a reflection in a round mirror,ğŸ”½and so on,ğŸ”½the nature of things such as mountains

original: rang bzhin yod pa srid pa min //ğŸ”½zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin yod pa srid pa min // zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: is not possible.

original: de la gang dag gis dngos po gzhan skye bar 'dod pa de dag gi yang gzugs brnyan dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la gang dag gis dngos po gzhan skye bar 'dod pa de dag gi yang gzugs brnyan dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: In that regard, for those who assert that things arise from other, since there is no connection with a reflection,

original: de ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
translated: that is not suitable in any way.

original: skye bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas las snga ma spyi'i bdag nyid de yang skye bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas kyi yul de na yang gsal bas stong pa'i yul na yod pa min te /
analyzed: skye bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas las snga ma spyi'i bdag nyid de yang skye bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas kyi yul de na yang gsal bas stong pa'i yul na yod pa min te /
translated: The prior universal nature of the substance that is arising is not in the place that is empty of the manifestation of the substance that is arising.

original: de'i @184b gnas khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i @184b gnas khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //

original: spyi de ni gsal ba skye ba la /
analyzed: spyi de ni gsal ba skye ba la /
translated: That universal is not in the arising manifestation.

original: phyis yod pa min na yang /
analyzed: phyis yod pa min na yang /
translated: Even though it does not exist later,

original: spyis stong pa'i gsal ba ni khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyis stong pa'i gsal ba ni khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the clarity that is empty of the universal is not accepted.

original: yul de yang gsal ba dang / lhan cig skye ba med pas gsal ba'i khyad par snga ma 'ga' zhig las kyang 'ongs pa med pa de ltar na mi 'gro zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: yul de yang gsal ba dang / lhan cig skye ba med pas gsal ba'i khyad par snga ma 'ga' zhig las kyang 'ongs pa med pa de ltar na mi 'gro zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid mjug bsdu ba'i sgo nas brjod pa yin no //
translated: And that object also does not arise simultaneously with the clarity, so it does not come from any previous particular clarity. Thus, it is said that it does not go. That is stated by way of conclusion.

original: rnam pa ci tsam gyis spyi gsal ba gzhan la yod pa'i rnam pa de ni mi 'dod de /
analyzed: rnam pa ci tsam gyis spyi gsal ba gzhan la yod pa'i rnam pa de ni mi 'dod de /
translated: To the extent that the universal is not accepted as having the aspect that exists in another clarity,

original: de la yang spyi 'dod na zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin la /
analyzed: de la yang spyi 'dod na zhes bya ba ni 'gal ba yin la /
translated: to that extent, if the universal is accepted in that, it is contradictory.

original: de yang shes rab dang ldan pa dag gis rtogs par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de yang shes rab dang ldan pa dag gis rtogs par dka' ba nyid kyi phyir /
translated: And that is difficult for the wise to understand.

original: khur bzhin no //
analyzed: khur bzhin no //
translated: Like a burden.

original: de nyid bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain that, he says

original: 'degs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: 'degs par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: â€œto lift upâ€ and so on.

original: blun po ni mi shes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: blun po ni mi shes pa'i phyir /
translated: The fool, because of ignorance,

original: rigs pa dang / mi rigs pa dpyad mi bzod pa brtag nus pa yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: rigs pa dang / mi rigs pa dpyad mi bzod pa brtag nus pa yin du zin kyang /

original: shes rab dang ldan pas ni nam rigs pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: shes rab dang ldan pas ni nam rigs pa ma yin pa /
translated: But the wise one, who is endowed with wisdom, does not endure what is not reasonable.

original: ji ltar bzod nus zhes blun po las gzhan du zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ji ltar bzod nus zhes blun po las gzhan du zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: How could he endure it?

original: spyi byed pa dang bcas pa yin kyang bla ste /
analyzed: spyi byed pa dang bcas pa yin kyang bla ste /
translated: It is all right if the universal is accompanied by activity.

original: de lta na yang de ni gsal ba snga na med pa la yod par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang de ni gsal ba snga na med pa la yod par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But even so, it is not reasonable that it should exist in the prior nonexistence of the manifestation.

original: gal te 'di ltar de ni cha med pa can du 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar de ni cha med pa can du 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: If it were like that, then it would be partless.

original: rten snga ma la cha gcig gis gnas sam /ğŸ”½rten snga ma spangs nas /
analyzed: rten snga ma la cha gcig gis gnas sam / rten snga ma spangs nas /
translated: Would it abide in one part on the prior basis?ğŸ”½Or would it be born in another part, a partless part, having abandoned the prior basis?

original: cha med pa'i cha gzhan gyis skye bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas la 'gro bar 'gyur na ;
analyzed: cha med pa'i cha gzhan gyis skye bar 'gyur ba'i rdzas la 'gro bar 'gyur na ;
translated: It would go to the substance.

original: de gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: But neither of those two is possible.

original: cha can min zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: cha can min zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, he says, â€œIt is not partless,â€ and so on.

original: rten snga ma'i zhes bya ba'i mdo'i cha dang / skye bar 'gyur ba'i yul las tha dad pa'i yul te zhes bya ba spel mar gsal bar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rten snga ma'i zhes bya ba'i mdo'i cha dang / skye bar 'gyur ba'i yul las tha dad pa'i yul te zhes bya ba spel mar gsal bar byed pa yin no //
translated: The phrase â€œon the prior basisâ€ and the phrase â€œin a place different from the place where it is bornâ€ are supplied.

original: de dag la zhes bya ba ni sngar byung ba dang / phyis 'byung ba'i rdzas dag la'o //
analyzed: de dag la zhes bya ba ni sngar byung ba dang / phyis 'byung ba'i rdzas dag la'o //
translated: â€œThoseâ€ refers to the previously and subsequently arisen substances.

original: yul tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: yul tha dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with â€œbecause of the difference in the object,â€ etc.

original: yan lag gzhan dang gzhan dag ste /
analyzed: yan lag gzhan dang gzhan dag ste /
translated: â€œOther partsâ€ means

original: phan tshun tha dad pa dag @185a * //
analyzed: phan tshun tha dad pa dag @185a * //
translated: mutually different.

original: gis ; de dang 'brel pa ste /
analyzed: gis ; de dang 'brel pa ste /
translated: â€œIn connection with thatâ€ means

original: yul tha dad pa de dag dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa de dag dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: in connection with those different objects.

original: snang ba la ni yan lag dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir yan lag gzhan gyis bum pa gzhan gyi snam bu la sogs pa dang 'brel par 'gyur ro //ğŸ”½thag pa dang dbyig pa dag gis /
analyzed: snang ba la ni yan lag dang bcas pa nyid kyi phyir yan lag gzhan gyis bum pa gzhan gyi snam bu la sogs pa dang 'brel par 'gyur ro // thag pa dang dbyig pa dag gis /
translated: Because of the difference in the object, the pot, which has parts, is connected with another part, such as the cloth.

original: rang gi 'brel pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rang gi 'brel pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The rope and the stick are also like that.

original: yan lag dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: yan lag dang bcas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: â€œThe one with parts,â€ etc.

original: de nyid du gzhung 'dzugs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid du gzhung 'dzugs par byed pa'o //
translated: establishes the thesis.

original: ci'i phyir rigs pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir rigs pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not reasonable?

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: He says â€œbecause of the difference in the object,â€ etc.

original: dngos po cha shas med pa de la rdzas gcig dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de bzlog nas /
analyzed: dngos po cha shas med pa de la rdzas gcig dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de bzlog nas /
translated: That which is the nature of a single substance related to a partless thing is excluded,

original: bdag nyid gnyis pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag nyid gnyis pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not have a second nature.
