translated: There is no contradiction in asserting that one thing has contradictory attributes, because the particular, such as arising, is always different, and

original: spyi yang tha dad pa la sogs pa skye ba med pa'i phyir thams cad la tha dad pa med pa can yin no zhe na /
analyzed: spyi yang tha dad pa la sogs pa skye ba med pa'i phyir thams cad la tha dad pa med pa can yin no zhe na /
translated: the universal is not different, because it does not arise, etc.

original: de'i phyir don dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir don dag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: Therefore, it is said, â€œThe meaning of the words, etc.â€

original: khyad par dang spyi'i don dag gi go rims bzhin du rnam pa thams cad du tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa can khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par dang spyi'i don dag gi go rims bzhin du rnam pa thams cad du tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa can khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the meaning of the words â€œparticularâ€ and â€œuniversalâ€ is asserted to be always different and not different, respectively.

original: ming 'ba' zhig ces bya ba khyad par dang spyi tha dad pa zhes bya ba de ni brjod pa tsam ste /
analyzed: ming 'ba' zhig ces bya ba khyad par dang spyi tha dad pa zhes bya ba de ni brjod pa tsam ste /
translated: â€œ Merely a nameâ€ means that the difference between the particular and the universal is merely a verbal expression.

original: 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing dngos por yang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing dngos por yang mi 'dod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is not asserted to be a thing.

original: khyad par dang spyi'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po phan tshun tha dad par 'dod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: khyad par dang spyi'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po phan tshun tha dad par 'dod pa kho na yin no //
translated: In particular, it is only the entity that has the nature of a universal and an individual that is asserted to be mutually different.

original: de yang ming tha dad par zad de don khas blangs nas de skad brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong du bshad zin to //
analyzed: de yang ming tha dad par zad de don khas blangs nas de skad brjod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa gong du bshad zin to //
translated: And that is just a different name, because the meaning is accepted and expressed in that way.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore means for that reason.

original: dngos po 'di ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par dang spyi phan tshun tha dad pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: dngos po 'di ni zhes bya ba ni khyad par dang spyi phan tshun tha dad pa kho na yin no //
translated: This entity means that the universal and the individual are mutually different.

original: ji lta bur gyur pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pa yin zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: grub pa dang bde ba gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the same in being established and happy.

original: chos 'gal ba gnas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: chos 'gal ba gnas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the mere abiding of contradictory phenomena.

original: rgyu de ni spyi dang khyad par blor mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu de ni spyi dang khyad par blor mi 'gyur te /
translated: That cause is not the cognition of a universal and an individual,

original: spyi dang khyad par dag ni phan tshun 'brel pa can gyi blor mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: spyi dang khyad par dag ni phan tshun 'brel pa can gyi blor mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because the cognition of a universal and an individual is not the cognition of mutually related things.

original: blo med pas kyang sgra yang spangs pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: blo med pas kyang sgra yang spangs pa kho na yin no //
translated: And because there is no cognition, the sound is also abandoned.

original: de ni blo'i rgyu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni blo'i rgyu can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of cognition.

original: de nyid kyi phyir 'grel pa las sgra rigs pa ma yin no zhes sgra med pa kho na bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir 'grel pa las sgra rigs pa ma yin no zhes sgra med pa kho na bshad do //
translated: For this very reason, the commentary explains that sound is not a universal, because it is nonexistent.

original: de med pa ni blo'i med pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de med pa ni blo'i med pa med na mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because its nonexistence is not independent of the nonexistence of cognition.

original: blo med pa la yang shugs kyis brjod pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: blo med pa la yang shugs kyis brjod pa kho na yin no //
translated: And the nonexistence of cognition is also indirectly expressed.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore means for that reason.

original: spyi 'di ni khyad par dag las don gzhan du gyur pa khyad par dag la ltos pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: spyi 'di ni khyad par dag las don gzhan du gyur pa khyad par dag la ltos pa med pa yin no //
translated: This universal is not different from the particulars, and it does not rely on the particulars.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: khyad par de dag gis spyi de ni ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par de dag gis spyi de ni ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because that universal is not produced by those particulars.

original: don gnyis pa ni de bas @200b na spyi las don gzhan khyad par gyi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po 'di ni spyi de la ltos pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: don gnyis pa ni de bas @200b na spyi las don gzhan khyad par gyi bdag nyid can gyi dngos po 'di ni spyi de la ltos pa med pa yin te /
translated: The second meaning is that this thing, which is the nature of the particulars that are different from the universal, does not rely on that universal.

original: des ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: des ma skyes pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because it is not produced by that.

original: rtag pa la don bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag pa la don bya bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a permanent thing cannot perform a function.

original: khyad par 'di'i spyi 'di zhes bya ba'am spyi 'di'i khyad par 'di zhes bya ba'i sgra rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par 'di'i spyi 'di zhes bya ba'am spyi 'di'i khyad par 'di zhes bya ba'i sgra rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: In particular, it is not logical to say â€œthis is the universal of thatâ€ or â€œthis is the particular of that universal.â€

original: gzhan sel ba la yang zhes bya ba ni spyi la gcig ni 'jig na gnas pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de de min zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba la yang zhes bya ba ni spyi la gcig ni 'jig na gnas pa'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de de min zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the case of the exclusion of other, if one thing is destroyed, it would follow that the identity that remains would not be that thing.

original: de ltar dha ba'am seng ldeng 'jig pa na shing ma yin pa las ldog pa shing gzhan la gnas pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: de ltar dha ba'am seng ldeng 'jig pa na shing ma yin pa las ldog pa shing gzhan la gnas pa kho na yin no //
translated: When a dhava or acacia tree is destroyed, it is only another tree that is excluded from being a non-tree.

original: mtshungs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas len 'debs par byed de /
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas len 'debs par byed de /
translated: He responds to that with â€œIt is not similarâ€ and so on.

original: 'dir ni gzhan sel ba ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni gzhan sel ba ni rnam pa gsum yin te /
translated: Here the exclusion of other is threefold.

original: re zhig gcig ni 'di las gzhan dang gzhan sel bar byed pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid bzlog pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: re zhig gcig ni 'di las gzhan dang gzhan sel bar byed pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid bzlog pa kho na yin no //
translated: First, it is the exclusion of other from itself because it excludes other from itself.

original: gang gi dbang du mdzad nas /ğŸ”½mthun dngos gzhan gyi dngos dag la //
analyzed: gang gi dbang du mdzad nas / mthun dngos gzhan gyi dngos dag la //
translated: With regard to that, it is said:ğŸ”½The exclusion of other

original: ldog pa la ni brten pa can //
analyzed: ldog pa la ni brten pa can //
translated: depends on the exclusion of the similar and the dissimilar.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs so //
translated: This is stated.

original: 'di yang sgra dang rtags la brten pa'i tha snyad kyi rten nyid du rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi sgras brjod par bya ba nyid du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang sgra dang rtags la brten pa'i tha snyad kyi rten nyid du rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi sgras brjod par bya ba nyid du ni ma yin no //
translated: This is also posited as the basis of conventional expressions that depend on words and signs, but it is not the object of expression by words.

original: gnyis pa ni gzhan gcod pa'i phyir gzhan rnam par gcod pa tsam yin zhing /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni gzhan gcod pa'i phyir gzhan rnam par gcod pa tsam yin zhing /
translated: The second is the mere exclusion of other in order to exclude other.

original: gang sngon gyi slob dpon dag gis thams cad la khyad par med pa rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: gang sngon gyi slob dpon dag gis thams cad la khyad par med pa rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
translated: This is the position of the former masters, which is not different for all.

original: thams cad la dgag pa tsam la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad la dgag pa tsam la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because negation is not different for all.

original: gsum pa ni 'dis gzhan sel bar byed pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i blo la snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gsum pa ni 'dis gzhan sel bar byed pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa'i blo la snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: The third is because it appears to the conceptual mind that excludes other by this.

original: gang bstan bcos mdzad pas sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid du bzhed pa zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: gang bstan bcos mdzad pas sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid du bzhed pa zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: This is what the author of the treatise asserts as the object of expression by words.

original: de la gal te rang gi mtshan nyid ldog pa'i dbang du byas nas brjod pa de mi rigs te /
analyzed: de la gal te rang gi mtshan nyid ldog pa'i dbang du byas nas brjod pa de mi rigs te /
translated: If it is said that the object of expression is not the exclusion of other, because it is not the object of expression by words, that is not so.ğŸ”½If it is said that the object of expression is not the exclusion of other, because it is not the object of expression by words, that is not so.

original: de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin na de zhig pa 'jig pa kho nar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yin na de zhig pa 'jig pa kho nar 'gyur te /
translated: If it were to become its nature, then it would be only the disintegration of that.ğŸ”½

original: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were to be of the nature of that, then it would be just the destruction of that, because there would be no difference.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid gnas pa gang yin pa de yang de las gzhan nyid du 'dod do ;
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid gnas pa gang yin pa de yang de las gzhan nyid du 'dod do ;
translated: And that which remains as its own characteristic is also asserted to be different from that.

original: / dgag pa tsam gang yin pa de yang rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir de ni rtsod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / dgag pa tsam gang yin pa de yang rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir de ni rtsod pa ma yin no //
translated: And that which is a mere negation is also essenceless. Therefore, that is not a dispute.

original: de ni ldog pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de ni ldog pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, â€œThat is the nature of the exclusion.â€

original: gnas dang gnas min rtog pa min //ğŸ”½khyad par gcig zhig pa na ci gzhan sel ba gnas sam 'on te log ces bya ba'i gnas @201a * //
analyzed: gnas dang gnas min rtog pa min // khyad par gcig zhig pa na ci gzhan sel ba gnas sam 'on te log ces bya ba'i gnas @201a * //
translated: It is not a matter of conceiving of what is possible and what is impossible.

original: dang gnas pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dang gnas pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa 'di ni rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: When one particular is destroyed, it is not reasonable to conceive of the question, â€œDoes the other exclusion remain or not?â€

original: de yang zhes bya ba gzhan sel ba ni rang bzhin gyis rjes su song ba can te dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa can no //
analyzed: de yang zhes bya ba gzhan sel ba ni rang bzhin gyis rjes su song ba can te dngos po'i rjes su 'jug pa can no //
translated: And that, the other exclusion, is naturally concomitant, following after the thing.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blo'i rnam pa mtshan nyid can gzhan ldog par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni spyi'i blo ste rnam par rtog pa can blo yang bslad cing 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i blo'i rnam pa mtshan nyid can gzhan ldog par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni spyi'i blo ste rnam par rtog pa can blo yang bslad cing 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: The other, which is the form of a conceptual cognition, is a general cognition, and is also a mistaken and deluded cognition.

original: de bas na 'on kyang de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na 'on kyang de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it also does not exist.

original: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is so,

original: bslad pa'i rgyu'i phyir ldog pa de ni sun phyung ba yang med pa ste /
analyzed: bslad pa'i rgyu'i phyir ldog pa de ni sun phyung ba yang med pa ste /
translated: that reversal is not refuted,

original: 'di la ji skad du bshad pa'i sun dbyung ba yod pa ma yin no zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di la ji skad du bshad pa'i sun dbyung ba yod pa ma yin no zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: and there is no refutation here of what has been explained.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa rnam pa gcig pa 'di ni yul med pa can kho na yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa rnam pa gcig pa 'di ni yul med pa can kho na yin te /
translated: This conceptual cognition is only devoid of an object,

original: 'di ltar log pa'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar log pa'i shes pa yin no //
translated: because it is a mistaken cognition.

original: gal te ji ltar na log pa kho na yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar na log pa kho na yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, â€œHow is it mistaken?â€

original: du ma la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: du ma la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, â€œBecause of many,â€ and so on.

original: 'di ltar du ma la gcig gi rnam pa can de ni yul te rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i yul spyi ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar du ma la gcig gi rnam pa can de ni yul te rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i yul spyi ni gnas pa'am mi gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the object that is the form of a unity in the many is not a universal that is the object of conceptual consciousness.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: log pa'i shes pa'i yul de ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: log pa'i shes pa'i yul de ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object of a mistaken consciousness does not exist.

original: nyes pa mtshungs pa nyid gsal nas yang rnam pa gzhan gyis rgol ba 'das pa yongs su gsal ba'i phyir gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: nyes pa mtshungs pa nyid gsal nas yang rnam pa gzhan gyis rgol ba 'das pa yongs su gsal ba'i phyir gang yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Having clarified the equivalence of the faults, in order to clarify the response to the objection in another way, he says, â€œNor is it produced from something else,â€ and so on.

original: de'i skyed pa po ste s'a lu'i myu gu de skyed pa po ni s'a lu'i sa bon de'i rang bzhin yin na /
analyzed: de'i skyed pa po ste s'a lu'i myu gu de skyed pa po ni s'a lu'i sa bon de'i rang bzhin yin na /
translated: If the producer of that, the rice sprout, is of the nature of the producer, the rice seed,

original: s'a lu'i sa bon de'i s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin la skye bar byed pa'i ngo bo de las sa la sogs pa gzhan ji ltar skyed byed yin /ğŸ”½de la zhes bya ba ni dag nye bar dgod pa'am /
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon de'i s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin la skye bar byed pa'i ngo bo de las sa la sogs pa gzhan ji ltar skyed byed yin / de la zhes bya ba ni dag nye bar dgod pa'am /
translated: then how could something else, such as the soil, be the producer of the rice sprout, which is produced from the nature of the rice seed?

original: rgol ba de la lan 'debs pa yin te /
analyzed: rgol ba de la lan 'debs pa yin te /
translated: With respect to that, the response to that objection is stated.

original: s'a lu'i sa bon las gzhan sa la sogs pa la ni de skyed par byed pa ste myu gu skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo med do zhes ni mi smra'o //
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon las gzhan sa la sogs pa la ni de skyed par byed pa ste myu gu skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo med do zhes ni mi smra'o //
translated: We do not say that the seed of rice, etc. does not have the nature of producing the sprout, in relation to the earth, etc.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What do we say?

original: s'a lu'i sa bon gcig gis skyed par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni gzhan sa la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes smras te /
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon gcig gis skyed par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni gzhan sa la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes smras te /
translated: We say that the nature of producing the sprout belongs to the seed of rice, etc., and not to the other, such as the earth.

original: dngos po rnams la phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po rnams la phan tshun rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because things do not have mutual concomitance.

original: gzhan dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: â€œThe otherâ€ is the earth, etc.

original: gzhan gyi ngo bos ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni s'a lu'i sa bon gyi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ngo bos ni ma yin te zhes bya ba ni s'a lu'i sa bon gyi ngo bo ni ma yin no //
translated: â€œNot by the nature of anotherâ€ means not by the nature of the seed of rice, etc.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de nyid med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it does not exist.

original: de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i @201b phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i @201b phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not have that nature.

original: 'di la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni med do snyam nas smras pa /
analyzed: 'di la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni med do snyam nas smras pa /
translated: Thinking that there is no valid cognition that contradicts this, he says:

original: de dag ni sa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni sa la sogs pa'o //
translated: â€œThoseâ€ refers to the earth, etc.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gang gi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni gang gi rang gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
translated: â€œJust as they areâ€ means that whatever is their intrinsic identity, that is their nature.

original: rang bzhin des phan tshun tha dad pa dang 'bras bu gcig skyed par byed pa 'di la 'gal ba ci yod de ;
analyzed: rang bzhin des phan tshun tha dad pa dang 'bras bu gcig skyed par byed pa 'di la 'gal ba ci yod de ;
translated: What contradiction is there in their being mutually different and producing a single effect?

original: gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni med pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig kyang med do //
analyzed: gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni med pa'i phyir 'ga' zhig kyang med do //
translated: There is no contradiction at all, because there is no valid cognition that contradicts that.

original: sa la sogs pa ni s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par 'dod pa'i s'a lu'i ngo bo dang bral ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: sa la sogs pa ni s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par 'dod pa'i s'a lu'i ngo bo dang bral ba ma yin nam /
translated: But isnâ€™t it the case that earth and so on are not devoid of the nature of rice that is asserted to be the cause of the arising of a rice sprout?

original: s'a lu'i myu gu'i 'bras bu can nyid yin pa ni 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: s'a lu'i myu gu'i 'bras bu can nyid yin pa ni 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: It is contradictory that they are the effect of a rice sprout.

original: de'i phyir ngo bo gcig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir ngo bo gcig dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore he says, â€œIf they have a single nature,â€ and so on.

original: s'a lu'i sa bon gcig gis skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de dang sa la sogs pa bral ba ni de'i ngo bo ste /ğŸ”½s'a lu'i sa bon gyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: s'a lu'i sa bon gcig gis skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de dang sa la sogs pa bral ba ni de'i ngo bo ste / s'a lu'i sa bon gyi rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The nature that is produced by a single rice seed is not devoid of that nature, that is, it does not lack the nature of a rice seed.

original: de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu can ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that it is not the effect of a rice seed.

original: 'on kyang de'i 'bras bu can kho na yin te /
analyzed: 'on kyang de'i 'bras bu can kho na yin te /
translated: But it is only the result of that.

original: 'di la s'a lu'i 'bras bu yod pas zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di la s'a lu'i 'bras bu yod pas zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The compound â€œhaving the result of thatâ€ is to be analyzed as â€œhaving the result of that, namely, rice.â€

original: gal te sa bon kho na myu gu skyed par byed pa yin par 'gyur na 'gal bar 'gyur te de yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te sa bon kho na myu gu skyed par byed pa yin par 'gyur na 'gal bar 'gyur te de yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: If the seed itself were to generate the sprout, there would be a contradiction, but that does not exist.

original: de nyid ni de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de nyid ni de nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: To explain this, he says, â€œThat itself is not that itself, etc.â€

original: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni s'a lu'i sa bon nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni s'a lu'i sa bon nyid kyis so //
translated: â€œThat itselfâ€ refers to the rice seed itself.

original: de'i 'bras bu ni myu gu zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu ni myu gu zhes bya'o //
translated: â€œIts resultâ€ is called the sprout.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bshad pa dran par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bshad pa dran par byed pa yin te /
translated: â€œMoreover, etc.â€ reminds us of what was explained earlier.

original: gcig dang bral na 'bras med phyir //
analyzed: gcig dang bral na 'bras med phyir //
translated: Because there would be no result if it were devoid of singularity,

original: khyad par rnams las de dag byung //
analyzed: khyad par rnams las de dag byung //
translated: they arise from the differences.

original: zhes bya ba'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis khyad par skyed par byed pa yin no zhes gong du bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis khyad par skyed par byed pa yin no zhes gong du bshad zin to //
translated: The power of valid knowledge has already been explained above, when it was said that â€œthey arise from the differences.â€

original: bdag nyid des zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo des so //
analyzed: bdag nyid des zhes bya ba ni skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo des so //
translated: â€œBy that itselfâ€ means by the nature of the generator.

original: sa bon gcig gis skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni sa la sogs pa gzhan la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa bon gcig gis skyed par byed pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni sa la sogs pa gzhan la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Whatever is the nature that produces from a single seed does not exist in others such as the earth.

original: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi ngo bo dang bral ba tsam gyis sa la sogs pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sa bon gyi ngo bo dang bral ba tsam gyis sa la sogs pa skyed par byed pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Not merely that much means that it is not that they do not produce the earth, etc. merely by being devoid of the nature of a seed.

original: gal te de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa de dag ste /
analyzed: gal te de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa de dag ste /
translated: If they are those, etc. means that they are those, i.e., the earth, etc.

original: khyad par dag la tha dad med pa yang yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khyad par dag la tha dad med pa yang yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: There is also non-difference in the particulars. This is the meaning.

original: de ltar gyur pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: That which is so, etc. explains that.

original: de dag kyang zhes bya ba ni khyad par dag go //
analyzed: de dag kyang zhes bya ba ni khyad par dag go //
translated: Those means the particulars.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i ngo bo de nyid ni nus pa @202a * //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i ngo bo de nyid ni nus pa @202a * //
translated: That very nature of non-difference is the single capacity.

original: gcig po de dag ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig po de dag ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is possessed by those.

original: des zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
analyzed: des zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni slob dpon gyi yin te /
translated: By that, etc. is the master's.

original: tha dad pa med pa'i ngo bo des khyad par de skyed byed min par bshad de /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa'i ngo bo des khyad par de skyed byed min par bshad de /
translated: By that nature of non-difference, it is explained that those particulars are not producers.

original: spyi'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: spyi'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with â€œIn general, etc.â€

original: khyad par dag gi spyi'i ngo bo nyid yod du zin kyang spyi'i ngo bo des khyad par de dag skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par dag gi spyi'i ngo bo nyid yod du zin kyang spyi'i ngo bo des khyad par de dag skyed par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Even if the nature of the universal exists, that nature of the universal does not produce those particulars.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: spyi'i ngo bo de las 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i ngo bo de las 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no destruction of that nature of the universal.

original: rgyu gcig la gnas pas kyang 'bras bu skyed par rab tu thal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba de yang /
analyzed: rgyu gcig la gnas pas kyang 'bras bu skyed par rab tu thal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba de yang /
translated: Also, because of the consequence that it would produce the effect by remaining in one cause,

original: tha dad med pa'i ngo bo de //
analyzed: tha dad med pa'i ngo bo de //
translated: that nature which is not different

original: bya min khyad par rnams dang bral //
analyzed: bya min khyad par rnams dang bral //
translated: is not the producer of the particulars.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gong du bshad zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas gong du bshad zin to //
translated: This has been explained above with â€œThat which is not different in nature, etc.â€

original: cig car skye 'jig 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas tha dad pa rab tu bsgrubs na /
analyzed: cig car skye 'jig 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gal ba'i chos gnas pas tha dad pa rab tu bsgrubs na /
translated: When the contradiction of the existence of difference is established by â€œThere would be simultaneous arising and destruction, etc.,â€

original: snang ba tha dad pas kyang bsgrubs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pas kyang bsgrubs pa'i phyir /
translated: then the difference of appearance is also established.

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: Therefore, he says, â€œMoreover, etc.â€

original: snang ba khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
analyzed: snang ba khyad par ji lta bu zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of difference in appearance is there?

original: gzhan mi brten pas te so sor gsal ba dang tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan mi brten pas te so sor gsal ba dang tha dad pa'o //
translated: because they are not dependent on others, i.e., they are distinct and separate.

original: yang gi sgras ni skye ba la sogs pa'i tha dad par byed pa'o //
analyzed: yang gi sgras ni skye ba la sogs pa'i tha dad par byed pa'o //
translated: The word â€œalsoâ€ indicates the difference of origination, etc.

original: de yang sngar bshad pa kho na sdud par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang sngar bshad pa kho na sdud par byed pa yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is just the previously explained that is summarized.

original: des ni zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med par smra ba'o //
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med par smra ba'o //
translated: â€œBy thatâ€ refers to the assertion of non-difference.

original: blo'i snang ba tha dad pa ni blo'i rnam pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: blo'i snang ba tha dad pa ni blo'i rnam pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: â€œThe difference of the appearance of cognitionâ€ is the difference of the aspects of cognition.

original: chos 'gal ba gnas pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pas na tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: chos 'gal ba gnas pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pas na tha dad pa'o //
translated: â€œThe contradiction of the existence of dharmasâ€ is the difference due to origination, destruction, etc.

original: de la yod de snang ba la sogs pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: de la yod de snang ba la sogs pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: â€œThe difference of existence, appearance, etc.â€ is the difference of existence, appearance, etc.

original: dngos po tha dad pa khas len na ni 'ga' zhig ste bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / rmongs pa dang sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa khas len na ni 'ga' zhig ste bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang / rmongs pa dang sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one accepts the difference of entities, then some, i.e., pleasure, pain, delusion, and the sentient, would not be different.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa yin na'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa med pa yin na'o //
translated: â€œIn that case,â€ i.e., if there is no difference,

original: rnam par dbye ba 'dir zhes bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba 'dir zhes bya ba ni snang ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: This analysis here means the analysis of appearance, etc.

original: gcig gi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni dper na bde ba'i bdag nyid gcig la snang ba la sogs pa tha dad pa med pa de dang 'dra bar ro //
analyzed: gcig gi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar zhes bya ba ni dper na bde ba'i bdag nyid gcig la snang ba la sogs pa tha dad pa med pa de dang 'dra bar ro //
translated: Just like a single identity means just as a single identity of pleasure is not different in appearance, etc.

original: de bas na phyi dang nang gi tha dad pa 'di ni khyad par kho na yin te /
analyzed: de bas na phyi dang nang gi tha dad pa 'di ni khyad par kho na yin te /
translated: Therefore, this difference between external and internal is only a distinction.

original: phan tshun mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba kho na yin no //
translated: It is only a difference in mutual characteristics.

original: ji lta bur 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bur 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: tha dad par snang ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad par snang ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: It is the appearance, etc., of difference.

original: gang la tha dad par snang ba la sogs pa yod pa ni zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: gang la tha dad par snang ba la sogs pa yod pa ni zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: That which has the appearance, etc., of difference is connected to the sentence.

original: gal te tha dad pa med pa can 'di la yang snang ba yod pa de bas na tha dad pa med pa la yang yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa med pa can 'di la yang snang ba yod pa de bas na tha dad pa med pa la yang yin no zhe na /
translated: If appearance exists in this absence of difference, then it exists in the absence of difference.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba @202b la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba @202b la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: Here, etc. is stated.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa la'o //
translated: Here means in difference.

original: gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa'o //
translated: The other is the second.

original: gang gi stobs kyis tha dad pa med pa can gyi stobs kyis so //
analyzed: gang gi stobs kyis tha dad pa med pa can gyi stobs kyis so //
translated: By the power of that, i.e., by the power of the particular.

original: de bas na khyad par te rang gi mtshan nyid kho na yin gyi spyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na khyad par te rang gi mtshan nyid kho na yin gyi spyi ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the particular is the specific property of an entity, not the universal.

original: khyad par de nyid don te dngos po yin no //
analyzed: khyad par de nyid don te dngos po yin no //
translated: That particular is the object, the entity.

original: shing nyid la sogs pa spyi'i chos gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag ni de nyid kyi ldog par brtags pa yin no //
analyzed: shing nyid la sogs pa spyi'i chos gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag ni de nyid kyi ldog par brtags pa yin no //
translated: The other properties of the universal, such as treeness, are imagined to be the exclusion of that.

original: de ni rgyu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid ni rgyu dang 'bras bu bshad cing de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid du brjod do //
analyzed: de ni rgyu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid ni rgyu dang 'bras bu bshad cing de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid du brjod do //
translated: The nature of the particular is explained as cause and effect, and that itself is called the specific property.

original: de spong len pa'i 'bras bu can yin zhes bya ba ni dor bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba'i khyad par de nyid la go rims bzhin du spong ba dang len pa'i 'bras bu la 'jug pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de spong len pa'i 'bras bu can yin zhes bya ba ni dor bar bya ba dang blang bar bya ba'i khyad par de nyid la go rims bzhin du spong ba dang len pa'i 'bras bu la 'jug pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: It has the effect of abandoning and adopting. The particular that is to be abandoned and adopted is said to have the effect of abandoning and adopting, respectively, which is engaged in that.

original: don gyi bya ba byed pa de la yang khyad par kho na yin te /
analyzed: don gyi bya ba byed pa de la yang khyad par kho na yin te /
translated: Moreover, the performance of the function of the object is a particular.

original: gang la yang spyi rnam par gzhag pa de ni de nyid ces bya ba khyad par gzhan te rigs mthun pa las ldog pa tha dad pa tsam yin gyi /
analyzed: gang la yang spyi rnam par gzhag pa de ni de nyid ces bya ba khyad par gzhan te rigs mthun pa las ldog pa tha dad pa tsam yin gyi /
translated: That which is posited as a universal is just a different particular, called â€œthatness,â€ which is a mere difference from that which is of a homogeneous type.

original: spyi zhes bya ba dngos por gyur pa de ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi zhes bya ba dngos por gyur pa de ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But a universal that is a real entity does not exist in the least.

original: gal te gyur na de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: gal te gyur na de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa yin te /
translated: If it did, it would be the characteristic of the apprehension of that,

original: khyad par ma rtogs par dmigs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par ma rtogs par dmigs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and one would apprehend it without realizing the particular.

original: gang gi phyir spyi de ni don te dngos po nyid du yod na snang bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir spyi de ni don te dngos po nyid du yod na snang bar 'gyur te /
translated: If that universal existed as an object, that is, as a real entity, it would appear.

original: de'i ngo bo dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du mi 'gyur zhing rang gi ngo bo mi 'dzin par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du mi 'gyur zhing rang gi ngo bo mi 'dzin par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: But it would not be the characteristic of the apprehension of its nature, and it would be illogical for it not to apprehend its own nature.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du byas pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid du byas pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because it is made the characteristic of the apprehension of that.

original: khyad par dag la tha dad pa med pa'i shes pas spyi nges par byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par dag la tha dad pa med pa'i shes pas spyi nges par byas pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is ascertained by a cognition that is non-different with regard to the particulars.

original: bdag nyid gzung ba med pa gzhan gyi shes pa'i rgyu yin no//
analyzed: bdag nyid gzung ba med pa gzhan gyi shes pa'i rgyu yin no//
translated: It is the cause of anotherâ€™s cognition, but not of itself.

original: ji ltar grangs can bas tha dad pa med par khyad par med pa yin na thams cad sgrub byed min /
analyzed: ji ltar grangs can bas tha dad pa med par khyad par med pa yin na thams cad sgrub byed min /
translated: Just as the SÄá¹ƒkhya maintains that, although there is no difference with regard to the universal, everything is not a cause of everything,

original: de ltar sangs rgyas pas kyang tha dad pas khyad par med pa yin na yang ngo //
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas pas kyang tha dad pas khyad par med pa yin na yang ngo //
translated: so too, the Buddhist maintains that, although there is no difference with regard to difference, everything is not a cause of everything.

original: lan 'di yang rgol ba gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: lan 'di yang rgol ba gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the reply to this objection?

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: He says, â€œJust as . . .â€

original: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin las zhes bya ba la s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin las sa la sogs pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin las zhes bya ba la s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin las sa la sogs pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: â€œFrom the nature of the producerâ€ means from the nature of the producer of a rice sprout, such as a rice seed, a field, water, and so on.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni myu gu'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni myu gu'o //
translated: â€œThisâ€ refers to the sprout.

original: ji ltar skyed par byed par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar skyed par byed par 'gyur /
translated: How could it be produced?

original: skyed par byed pa nyid du khas len na yang tha dad pa khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad skyed par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gang bshad pa yin no //ğŸ”½'dir brgal ba'i lan @203a * //
analyzed: skyed par byed pa nyid du khas len na yang tha dad pa khyad par med pa'i phyir thams cad skyed par byed par 'gyur ro zhes gang bshad pa yin no // 'dir brgal ba'i lan @203a * //
translated: If you accept that it is a producer, then because there is no difference between the distinct, everything would be a producer.

original: bstan nas / da ni gnyis pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan nas / da ni gnyis pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: Here, having taught the response to the objection, now, the second is stated.

original: yang ci zhig rtog ce na /
analyzed: yang ci zhig rtog ce na /
translated: What is being imagined?

original: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: He says, â€œIf, although the distinct are the same,â€ and so on.

original: gal te zhes tha dad pa mtshungs pa yin du zin kyang so sor nges pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa dang / skyed par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par med par 'gyur ba de ltar 'gyur na ni zhes bya ba ni brgal ba'o //
analyzed: gal te zhes tha dad pa mtshungs pa yin du zin kyang so sor nges pa'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa dang / skyed par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khyad par med par 'gyur ba de ltar 'gyur na ni zhes bya ba ni brgal ba'o //
translated: If, although the distinct are the same, there would be no difference characterized by producing a result that is determined individually and not producing it, then, this is the objection.

original: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshigs su bcad pa'i don ston to //
analyzed: ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshigs su bcad pa'i don ston to //
translated: â€œ How?â€ and so on teaches the meaning of the verse.

original: bdag nyid tha dad pa med par smra ba grangs can 'di'i tha dad pa med par khyad par med pa yin na yang yin la ji ltar thams cad thams cad kyi skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de ltar sangs rgyas pa'i tha dad pa khyad par med
analyzed: bdag nyid tha dad pa med par smra ba grangs can 'di'i tha dad pa med par khyad par med pa yin na yang yin la ji ltar thams cad thams cad kyi skyed par byed pa ma yin pa de ltar sangs rgyas pa'i tha dad pa khyad par med
translated: If this SÄá¹ƒkhya assertion of nondifference is no different from our assertion of difference, then just as everything is not the producer of everything, so too the difference of the Buddhist assertion of differenceğŸ”½

original: pa yin na yang thams cad thams cad kyi skyed par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: pa yin na yang thams cad thams cad kyi skyed par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes sbyar ro //
translated: If this SÄá¹ƒkhya, who advocates nondifference, is the same as the Buddhist, who advocates nondifference, then just as everything is not the producer of everything, so too, the Buddhist, who advocates nondifference, would not have everything producing everything.

original: dngos chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i nus pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: dngos chos nyid kyis zhes bya ba ni dngos po'i nus pa nyid kyis so //
translated: The phrase â€œby the power of thingsâ€ means by the power of entities.

original: dngos po rnams tha dad pa med par khas len na yang thams cad du tha dad pa med par khas blangs pa gcig po de'i bya ba gcig la byed pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po rnams tha dad pa med par khas len na yang thams cad du tha dad pa med par khas blangs pa gcig po de'i bya ba gcig la byed pa 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though one accepts that things are nondifferent, it is contradictory that the one nondifference that is accepted would perform a function in everything.

original: tha dad pa tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: tha dad pa tsam zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with â€œmere difference,â€ and so on.

original: rgyu ste nye bar len pa'i rgyu dang rkyen de lhan cig byed pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu ste nye bar len pa'i rgyu dang rkyen de lhan cig byed pa'o //
translated: The cause is the appropriating cause and the condition is the co-operating cause.

original: rang gi rgyu dang rkyen de de dag gi khyad par gyis 'bras bu grub par byed nus pa nges par byas pa'i rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu dang rkyen de de dag gi khyad par gyis 'bras bu grub par byed nus pa nges par byas pa'i rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste /
translated: That which is ascertained to be able to produce an effect by virtue of its specific cause and conditions is said to have a nature.

original: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de'i phyir ro //
translated: Its entity is just that, because of that.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni skyed par byed par 'dod pa las gzhan ni byed pa por mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni skyed par byed par 'dod pa las gzhan ni byed pa por mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not another, because that which is asserted to be a producer is not a creator other than that.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not of its nature.

original: de'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not of the nature to produce its effect.

original: de ni zhes bya ba ni yon tan gsum po gcig na'o //
analyzed: de ni zhes bya ba ni yon tan gsum po gcig na'o //
translated: That is, when one of the three qualities is present.

original: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gcig nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nyid la zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gcig nyid la'o //
translated: In that very thing, in the very same effect.

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam pa de nyid kyis so //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i rnam pa de nyid kyis so //
translated: In this way, by that very differentiation.

original: gal te 'di ltar s'a lu'i sa bon s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par byed pa de nyid kyi tshe nas kyi sa bon ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gal te 'di ltar s'a lu'i sa bon s'a lu'i myu gu skyed par byed pa de nyid kyi tshe nas kyi sa bon ni ma yin la /
translated: If the rice seed itself produces the rice sprout, and the barley seed does not,

original: nas kyi sa bon gang yin pa de nyid s'a lu'i sa bon gyi bdag nyid yin pa de ltar na gcig la gcig ni byed pa dang byed pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nas kyi sa bon gang yin pa de nyid s'a lu'i sa bon gyi bdag nyid yin pa de ltar na gcig la gcig ni byed pa dang byed pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and if the barley seed itself is the nature of the rice seed, then one would obtain the rice and barley seeds without any activity.

original: gal te s'a lu'i sa bon la sogs pa nye bar gnas pa de dang des yon tan gsum la tha dad pa yang yod @203b pa'i tha dad pa de'i phyir byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang med la /
analyzed: gal te s'a lu'i sa bon la sogs pa nye bar gnas pa de dang des yon tan gsum la tha dad pa yang yod @203b pa'i tha dad pa de'i phyir byed pa 'ga' zhig kyang med la /
translated: If the rice seed, etc., which are present, are different from the three qualities, then because of that difference, there is no activity at all.

original: gal te tha dad na yang byed pa med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis lhan cig byed pa byed par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te tha dad na yang byed pa med pa'i gtan tshigs kyis lhan cig byed pa byed par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If they are different, then because of the reason that there is no activity, the co-arising of the conditions would not be activity.

original: de dag kyang phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang phan tshun tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are mutually different.

original: rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains with â€œIn no way different,â€ etc.ğŸ”½In no way different means

original: rnam pa thams cad du tha dad pa med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du tha dad pa med pa ste /
translated: not different in any way.

original: rnam pa thams cad du gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du gcig pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: It is not identical in all respects,

original: tha dad pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists as different.

original: de ltar na yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyir byed pa po nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na yang zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i phyir byed pa po nyid ma yin no //
translated: Even so, it is not the agent, because it is different.

original: rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kun du brtags pa'i gnas skabs tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kun du brtags pa'i gnas skabs tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is different in some respects, because it is different in the context of some conceptualization.

original: de ltar ma yin na ni grangs can de kho na nyid smra ba'i gnas skabs tha dad pa yang rnyed par dka'o //
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na ni grangs can de kho na nyid smra ba'i gnas skabs tha dad pa yang rnyed par dka'o //
translated: Otherwise, it would be difficult to find a difference in the context of the SÄá¹ƒkhyaâ€™s doctrine of reality.

original: gang gi tshe s'a lu'i sa bon gyi bdag nyid de yongs su gyur pa nyid du gzhan du nas kyi sa bon kyang s'a lu'i myu gu'i rgyu byed pa'i rim pas thams cad la thams cad nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi tshe s'a lu'i sa bon gyi bdag nyid de yongs su gyur pa nyid du gzhan du nas kyi sa bon kyang s'a lu'i myu gu'i rgyu byed pa'i rim pas thams cad la thams cad nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir /
translated: When that which is the nature of a rice seed transforms into another, a barley seed would be the cause of a rice sprout, and everything would be connected to everything,

original: byed pa po nyid med pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po nyid med pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: so it is not the case that there is no agent.

original: de'i phyir 'on te rim bzhin zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'on te rim bzhin zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, â€œBut if it is in sequence,â€

original: rim pa de spyi dngos po gcig po de nyid yin nam zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rim pa de spyi dngos po gcig po de nyid yin nam zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: is that one entity the same in all stages?

original: rim pa ni tha dad pa la brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
analyzed: rim pa ni tha dad pa la brten pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya bar bsams pa'o //
translated: The idea is that a stage is based on a difference.

original: 'on te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: 'on te yang zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: But if, he says, etc.

original: tha dad pa thams cad ni 'bras bu thams cad la go rims te /
analyzed: tha dad pa thams cad ni 'bras bu thams cad la go rims te /
translated: All differences are in all effects in order,

original: rim bzhin du nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim bzhin du nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are applied in order.

original: de yang gang gi tshe gtso bo'i nus pas bskyed pa'i tha dad pa'i dngos por yod pa de dag nyid ni nus pa gcig dang ldan zhing don gyi bya ba byed pa yin no zhes brten pa de'i tshe bstan to //
analyzed: de yang gang gi tshe gtso bo'i nus pas bskyed pa'i tha dad pa'i dngos por yod pa de dag nyid ni nus pa gcig dang ldan zhing don gyi bya ba byed pa yin no zhes brten pa de'i tshe bstan to //
translated: And that is established when they exist as different things produced by the power of primordial matter, and they are endowed with one power and perform the function of an object.

original: gang gi gtso bo'i nus pa kho na dngos po yod pa yin zhing de nyid don byed pa la nye bar sbyor ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gang gi gtso bo'i nus pa kho na dngos po yod pa yin zhing de nyid don byed pa la nye bar sbyor ba yin gyi /
translated: When primordial matter alone is the existent thing and it alone is applied to the performance of an objectâ€™s function,

original: tha dad pa dag ni gnas skabs 'ba' zhig tsam gyi rgyu yin te /
analyzed: tha dad pa dag ni gnas skabs 'ba' zhig tsam gyi rgyu yin te /
translated: then the differences are merely the causes of the temporary state.

original: don dam par yod pa nyid ma yin no zhes ston pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: don dam par yod pa nyid ma yin no zhes ston pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is taught that ultimately it does not exist,

original: der nye bar gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: der nye bar gnas pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: then it should be said that it abides there, etc.

original: nus pa ni yon tan gsum gyi mtshan nyid can no //ğŸ”½der nye bar gnas pa ni sngar skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'dod pa'i don la nye bar gnas nas des /
analyzed: nus pa ni yon tan gsum gyi mtshan nyid can no // der nye bar gnas pa ni sngar skyed par byed pa ma yin par 'dod pa'i don la nye bar gnas nas des /
translated: Potency is characterized by the three qualities.ğŸ”½Abiding there means that it abides in the object that previously was not produced, and later it is applied to the transformation into another nature.

original: phyis ngo bo gzhan du yongs su 'gyur ba la nye bar sbyor ba'i phyir 'ga' zhig kyang byed pa po ma yin pa ni med par 'gyur te zhes bya ba 'di dang sbyar ro //

analyzed: pa med par smra bas ba lang la sogs pa'i khyad par dag la spyi rjes su zhugs shing /

translated: This person who seeks to perform an object also argues and investigates the nature of that which is not shared with others, in terms of difference and nondifference.

original: gzhan sel ba smra ba dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid la yang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid rdzas nyid la sogs pa tha dad pa med par 'dod pa de bas na /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba smra ba dag kyang rang gi mtshan nyid la yang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid rdzas nyid la sogs pa tha dad pa med par 'dod pa de bas na /
translated: The proponents of apoha also assert that the defining characteristic of the exclusion of other is not different from the substance of the defining characteristic itself.

original: khyad par dang shin tu tha dad pa 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par dang shin tu tha dad pa 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the distinction and the difference are mutually exclusive.

original: de'i phyir de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, â€œthatâ€ and so on are stated.

original: don gyi bya ba byed pa'i don de ni ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad par gnas pa yin du zin kyang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdzas nyid la sogs pa tha dad pa med pa dang khyad par 'di la 'gal ba med pa kho na yin te
analyzed: don gyi bya ba byed pa'i don de ni ngo bo nyid kyis tha dad par gnas pa yin du zin kyang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rdzas nyid la sogs pa tha dad pa med pa dang khyad par 'di la 'gal ba med pa kho na yin te
translated: Even if the meaning of the performance of an action is established as inherently different, there is no contradiction in the fact that the substance, etc., which are characterized by the exclusion, are not different, and that they are distinguished.

original: / de ni brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / de ni brtags pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is just a postulation.

original: de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid rnams ni don dam par tha dad pa yin zhing gcig pa nyid du nye bar brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid rnams ni don dam par tha dad pa yin zhing gcig pa nyid du nye bar brtags pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the own characteristics are ultimately different, and they are just imagined to be the same.

original: rnam pa 'di nyid kyis kyang kho bo cag tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med par 'dod do //
analyzed: rnam pa 'di nyid kyis kyang kho bo cag tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med par 'dod do //

analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir ldog pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la smos te / log pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khas blangs so zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: In order to demonstrate just that, he says, â€œThe exclusion, etc.â€ğŸ”½The substance, etc., which are characterized by the exclusion, are accepted as not different.

original: gal te ldog pa'i ngo bo spyis tha dad pa med pa ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te ldog pa'i ngo bo spyis tha dad pa med pa ni ma yin gyi /

analyzed: tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba gsal ba dag las don gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa'o //
translated: A universal that is a real entity is not different from the particulars.

original: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni khyad par dag ni spyi las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid dam khyad par dang 'dra bar yang du ma nyid du 'gyur ro zhes gong du bshad zin to ;
analyzed: bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni khyad par dag ni spyi las tha dad pa med pa'i phyir gcig pa nyid dam khyad par dang 'dra bar yang du ma nyid du 'gyur ro zhes gong du bshad zin to ;

analyzed: / spyi khas blangs nas khyad par dag gcig nyid du ni brjod pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang khyad par gang yin pa de tha dad pa med pa yin no zhe na /

analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

analyzed: 'di ltar ba lang gi dngos po gcig kyang rgyu nyid du 'dod na de'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: rnga mo'i ngo bo'am zho'i ngo bo gcig dang 'dres pa can gyi blo ste /

translated: Because of the difference in the appearance of the cognition, those natures of curd and camel are different in their intrinsic natures.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: gcig dang du ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gcig dang du ma'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: snang ba tha dad pa ni du ma'i tha snyad kyi yul yin la snang ba tha dad med pa la ni gcig gi tha snyad kyi yul yin no zhes sbyar bar bya'o //

analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa'i yul dag kyang zho dang rnga mo dag yin no // de ltar na @209b gcig po ste / rnga mo la ni zho ni de gnyi ga'i ngo bo ma yin te /

analyzed: zho dang rnga mo'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo gang la gnyi ga yod pa zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //

original: de ni log par smra ba yin te /
analyzed: de ni log par smra ba yin te /

original: 'gyur bar smra ba'o //
analyzed: 'gyur bar smra ba'o //

original: ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyis so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyis so //

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni chu la sogs pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa can no //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni chu la sogs pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu gcig pa can no //
translated: The phrase â€œand so onâ€ refers to the effect of holding water and so on.

original: dngos po rnams kyi zhes bya ba gzhan gyi dngos po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa ni ngo bo nyid kyis gzhan las ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi zhes bya ba gzhan gyi dngos po rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa ni ngo bo nyid kyis gzhan las ldog pa yin no //
translated: The â€œown natureâ€ of other things, i.e., of other entities, is their intrinsic identity, which is the exclusion of other.

analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni nus pa med pa zhes bya ba dag la'o // ji ltar bzhin tha dad pa'i yul can te / ldog pa'i yul can gyi sgra gzhan sel ba smra bar brjod par mi nus la /
translated: â€œ In that caseâ€ means in the case of those that are not capable.ğŸ”½The cognition and the word are restricted to the excluded object.ğŸ”½It is not possible to express the exclusion of other by a word that has an object that is not excluded.

original: nye bar brjod pa med pa dag la sgra rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: nye bar brjod pa med pa dag la sgra rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur ro snyam na /

original: gang gi phyir de dag la yang gdon mi za bar sgra 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de dag la yang gdon mi za bar sgra 'jug par 'gyur ro //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: shes pa dang sgra'i yul nyid du rnam pa 'ba' zhig gis rnam par ma bzhag pa dag la ste /
analyzed: shes pa dang sgra'i yul nyid du rnam pa 'ba' zhig gis rnam par ma bzhag pa dag la ste /

original: nye bar brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don thams cad la sgrub pa dang dgag pa mi rung ba'i phyir gal te 'ga' zhig tu med pa'i rnam pa bkag pas shes pa brjod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: nye bar brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i don thams cad la sgrub pa dang dgag pa mi rung ba'i phyir gal te 'ga' zhig tu med pa'i rnam pa bkag pas shes pa brjod par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: Because it is impossible to establish or deny anything in the absence of verbal expression, if cognition were to be expressed by the negation of the form of nonexistence,

analyzed: bkag pa'i rnam pa spangs pa'i don ni bsgrub par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: then the meaning that is excluded from the form of negation would be established.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba sgrub pa dang dgag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba sgrub pa dang dgag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, there would be establishment and negation.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rten gyi tha snyad gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag ni sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i rten gyi tha snyad gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The terms â€œpositive concomitanceâ€ and â€œnegative concomitanceâ€ are used for any verbal expression that is based on establishment and negation.

original: tha snyad de nyid med pa ni me ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston te /
analyzed: tha snyad de nyid med pa ni me ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ston te /

analyzed: me ni dro ba'i rang bzhin ni yin no zhes bya ba rjes su 'gro ba'i rten pa can gyi tha snyad yin no //
translated: â€œFire is hot by natureâ€ is a verbal expression that is based on positive concomitance.

original: dro ba med pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i rten can no //
analyzed: dro ba med pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i rten can no //
translated: â€œIt is not that fire is not hotâ€ is based on negative concomitance.

original: tha snyad 'di yang 'jig rten la rab tu grags par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir yang gi sgra smos te /
analyzed: tha snyad 'di yang 'jig rten la rab tu grags par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir yang gi sgra smos te /
translated: The word â€œalsoâ€ is stated to show that this convention is not well known in the world.

original: dro ba'i tha snyad ni dro ba med pa rnam par gcad pas /
analyzed: dro ba'i tha snyad ni dro ba med pa rnam par gcad pas /
translated: The convention of â€œwarmthâ€ is the definition of â€œnon-warmth,â€

original: dro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rna pa 'ga' zhig rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rna pa 'ga' zhig rnam par gzhag pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established as some other thing.

original: de rnams bcad nas ji ltar dro ba rnam par gzhag pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams bcad nas ji ltar dro ba rnam par gzhag pa yin zhe na /

original: de ni rang bzhin gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, â€œIt is called the nature of another,â€ and so on.

original: dro ba med pa kho na dro ba'i rang bzhin @210a * //
analyzed: dro ba med pa kho na dro ba'i rang bzhin @210a * //
translated: Non-warmth is the nature of warmth,

original: las don gzhan mtshan nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: las don gzhan mtshan nyid med pa yin te /
translated: which is not a different characteristic from it.

original: de spangs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya bas bzhin bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de spangs pa'i tshul gyis zhes bya bas bzhin bshad pa yin no //
translated: By the method of abandoning that, it is explained as it is.

original: de nyid kyi phyir med pa zhes bya ba de 'thad kyi /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir med pa zhes bya ba de 'thad kyi /
translated: For that very reason, it is called â€œnon-existence,â€

original: rang gi ngo bo khyad par gyi rang bzhin gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo khyad par gyi rang bzhin gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the nature of another, which is a different characteristic from its own nature.

original: rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang rnam par rtog pa'i blo dang sgra'i yul nyid du rnam par gzhag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis kyang rnam par rtog pa'i blo dang sgra'i yul nyid du rnam par gzhag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established as an object of the conceptual mind and words in any way.

original: rnam pa thams cad du me med pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du me med pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no realization of the complete nonexistence of fire,

original: rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid me'i rang bzhi rtogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa'i mtshan nyid me'i rang bzhi rtogs pa med pa ste /
translated: there is no realization of the nature of fire, which is characterized by exclusion.

original: dper na me'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du dngos po thams cad la yin pa de bas na 'gro ba rmongs shing nges pa med pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dper na me'i rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du dngos po thams cad la yin pa de bas na 'gro ba rmongs shing nges pa med pa'i ngo bor 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as the nature of fire is, so it is with all things. Therefore, the world would be confused and have a nature of uncertainty.

original: de ltar gyur na me la sogs pa de la 'ga' zhig med pa ma yin pa gang gis med du zin kyang gdon mi za bar sgra 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes brgal ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar gyur na me la sogs pa de la 'ga' zhig med pa ma yin pa gang gis med du zin kyang gdon mi za bar sgra 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes brgal ba yin te /
translated: If that were the case, it would be argued that fire and so on would not be nonexistent in any way, and even if they were nonexistent, the term would necessarily be used.

original: 'on kyang dro ba ma yin pa'i reg bya zhes bya ba'i dngos po yod pa kho na me las don gzhan du 'gyur ba dgag pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang dro ba ma yin pa'i reg bya zhes bya ba'i dngos po yod pa kho na me las don gzhan du 'gyur ba dgag pa yin no //
translated: However, it is the negation of the mere existence of a thing called â€œnon-hot tactile object,â€ which would be different from fire.

original: dro ba ni me yin gyi dro ba med pa ni ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: dro ba ni me yin gyi dro ba med pa ni ma yin pa'am /
translated: Warmth is fire, but it is not the case that there is no warmth.

original: me la dro ba ma yin pa'i reg pa med do zhes de ltar bkag pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½/ bam po nyi shu pa /
analyzed: me la dro ba ma yin pa'i reg pa med do zhes de ltar bkag pa'i phyir ro // / bam po nyi shu pa /
translated: Or, fire does not have a tangible object that is not warm.

original: da ni ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa yod pa kho na zhes bya ba'i tshig las yod pa nyid du dod pa yin la /
analyzed: da ni ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa yod pa kho na zhes bya ba'i tshig las yod pa nyid du dod pa yin la /
translated: Now, beginning with â€œIf it is said,â€ he responds to the statement, â€œIt exists.â€

original: 'gog par byed ces bya ba med pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'gog par byed ces bya ba med pa nyid yin na /
translated: If it is said that existence is refuted,

original: ji ltar gcig la yod pa dang med pa zhes bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar gcig la yod pa dang med pa zhes bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: how can existence and nonexistence be said to be one?

original: thams cad la zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de de la me la dro ba med pa med do zhes bya ba 'dis thams cad la dro ba med pa med pa nyid do zhes mi smra la /
analyzed: thams cad la zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de de la me la dro ba med pa med do zhes bya ba 'dis thams cad la dro ba med pa med pa nyid do zhes mi smra la /
translated: He responds to this with â€œIn all cases,â€ and so on. In this context, the statement â€œWarmth does not not exist in fireâ€ does not mean that in all cases warmth does not not exist.

original: de skad du smras pa na yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa yin te /
analyzed: de skad du smras pa na yod pa nyid du khas blangs pa yin te /
translated: If it is said that way, existence is accepted.

original: yang thams cad la yod pa nyid bkag pa ni chos thams cad bkag pa se /
analyzed: yang thams cad la yod pa nyid bkag pa ni chos thams cad bkag pa se /
translated: Moreover, the refutation of existence in all cases is the refutation of all phenomena.

original: gcig la yod pa dang med pa nyid khas bo langs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gcig la yod pa dang med pa nyid khas bo langs par 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be contradictory for something to exist and not exist in the same thing.

original: me de 'ba' zhig la dro ba med pa med do zhes smra'o//
analyzed: me de 'ba' zhig la dro ba med pa med do zhes smra'o//
translated: We say that only fire has heat, not the absence of heat.

original: de bas na gzhan la yod pa dang gzhan la med pa nyid ni 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gzhan la yod pa dang gzhan la med pa nyid ni 'gal ba yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not contradictory for something to exist in one thing and not in another.

original: 'di nyid kyi rigs pa yang dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: dus ni da lta yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'o //

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

analyzed: de bkag na ste chos can bkag na /

analyzed: de bas na chos can gyi sgra 'jug pa med pa'i phyir gang la yul ma bstan pa la dgag pa'i sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, because the word â€œsubjectâ€ is not used, there is no syllogistic formulation of a negation without a subject.

original: 'di na 'di med do zhes bya ba gdon mi za bar 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis dgag pa'i yul la nye bar dgod par bya'i /
analyzed: 'di na 'di med do zhes bya ba gdon mi za bar 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig gis dgag pa'i yul la nye bar dgod par bya'i /
translated: In this case, â€œthere is no x hereâ€ must be stated by the words â€œhereâ€ and so on, which indicate the place of negation.

analyzed: gzhan du na yul gang la 'di dgag pa yin zhes bya ba shes par mi 'gyur ro //

original: des kyang gsal bar byed pa la sogs pa'i gzhung thams cad phyogs snga mar byas pa'i sgo nas sun dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dgod pa yin no //
analyzed: des kyang gsal bar byed pa la sogs pa'i gzhung thams cad phyogs snga mar byas pa'i sgo nas sun dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir dgod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, all the passages of the Vá¹›ttikÄra, beginning with the words â€œto make known,â€ are cited in order to refute them by showing that they are the statements of an opponent.

translated: â€œ Butâ€ and so on asks a question.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni yul dang dus dang chos bkag pa'o //

translated: â€œ In that caseâ€ means in regard to the negation of place, time, and property.

translated: The word â€œand so onâ€ in â€œplace and so onâ€ includes time.

translated: The plural particle is used because there are many different manifestations.

analyzed: de bkag na yang zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa bkag pa na yang nyes pa mtshungs pa yin te /

original: med pas 'brel pa'i bkag pa de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: med pas 'brel pa'i bkag pa de dang 'dra ste /

analyzed: de ltar na de lta bu med pa'i rnam pa 'dis bum pa med do zhes bstan pa na /
translated: Thus, when it is shown that â€œThe pot does not existâ€ by this mode of non-existence,

translated: the connection of the kingâ€™s men is the cause of the exclusion. At that time, it is understood in the manner of a connection.

original: de'i phyir brjod pa yin na ni 'brel pa nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /ğŸ”½rgyal po dang skyes @212a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir brjod pa yin na ni 'brel pa nyid du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / rgyal po dang skyes @212a * //
translated: Therefore, if it is expressed, â€œthe connection itselfâ€ and so on is stated.

original: bu dag gi 'brel pa zhes bya ba brjod pa yin na ni /
analyzed: bu dag gi 'brel pa zhes bya ba brjod pa yin na ni /
translated: If the connection of the king and the man is expressed,ğŸ”½â€œthe connection of the kingâ€™s menâ€ is the cause of the exclusion. At that time, it is understood in the manner of a connection.

original: rgyal po dang skyes bu phan tshu ltos pa dag las byung ba dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'brel pa nyid du blo la gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rgyal po dang skyes bu phan tshu ltos pa dag las byung ba dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'brel pa nyid du blo la gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: The nature of the relation that arises from the king and the man who is dependent on him is established in the intellect as a relation.

original: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: It is not understood in accordance with the intention.

original: rgyal po'i skyes bu zhes bya ba phan tshun ltos pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ji ltar shes par 'dod pa'i tshul gyis de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyal po'i skyes bu zhes bya ba phan tshun ltos pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ji ltar shes par 'dod pa'i tshul gyis de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: The man who is called the king's man is not understood in accordance with the way in which the relation characterized by mutual dependence is intended to be understood.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore means for that reason.

original: 'brel pa 'di 'brel pa'i sgra las rtogs par 'gyur na yang /
analyzed: 'brel pa 'di 'brel pa'i sgra las rtogs par 'gyur na yang /
translated: Even though this relation is understood from the word relation,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pas 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bos brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rnam pas 'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bos brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not expressed by its own nature because it has the nature of a relation in the way that has been explained.

original: de bas na med pa dang 'dra bar 'brel pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bas na med pa dang 'dra bar 'brel pa la yang thal bar 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba la /
translated: Therefore, the consequence that the relation is like a non-existent does not apply.

original: med pa ni ji ltar blos yul du byas pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba yin par 'dod pa de ltar 'brel pa la yang brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: med pa ni ji ltar blos yul du byas pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba yin par 'dod pa de ltar 'brel pa la yang brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: But it is not so with a relation, which is not an object of the intellect, and therefore cannot be said to be expressible.

original: med pa ni rang gi ngo bo blo'i yul du byas pa de ltar sgras kyang brjod par bya ba yin la 'brel pa ni rang gi ngo bor gzung bar byas pa ma yin zhing brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: med pa ni rang gi ngo bo blo'i yul du byas pa de ltar sgras kyang brjod par bya ba yin la 'brel pa ni rang gi ngo bor gzung bar byas pa ma yin zhing brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: An unreal object is made the object of the intellect, and is therefore expressible by words. But a relation is not apprehended as an object, and is therefore not expressible.

original: 'brel pa'i ngo bo thob pa nyid ni yul nyid du byed pa'i phyir dang brjod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i ngo bo thob pa nyid ni yul nyid du byed pa'i phyir dang brjod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For the relation is made the object of the intellect and is expressed by words only when it has assumed the form of a relation.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'brel pa rdzas yod ma yin pas //
analyzed: 'brel pa rdzas yod ma yin pas //
translated: Since the relation is not a substance,

original: de yi ngo bo gzung du med ;ğŸ”½/'brel pa'i rang gi ngo bor ni //
analyzed: de yi ngo bo gzung du med ; /'brel pa'i rang gi ngo bor ni //
translated: its nature cannot be apprehended.ğŸ”½The relation is not expressible

original: brjod par ji ltar yod pa min //
analyzed: brjod par ji ltar yod pa min //
translated: in its own nature.

original: de bas na rnam par rtog pa'i yul 'di gnod mi za bar brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar de gnas so //
analyzed: de bas na rnam par rtog pa'i yul 'di gnod mi za bar brjod par bya ba yin no zhes bya bar de gnas so //
translated: Therefore, this object of conceptual construction is certainly expressible.

original: de'i phyir gal te 'brel pa med do zhes bya ba'i blor 'gyur ba de'i tshe de las byung ba'i sgra yang 'jug par 'gyur ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te 'brel pa med do zhes bya ba'i blor 'gyur ba de'i tshe de las byung ba'i sgra yang 'jug par 'gyur ba kho na yin te /

analyzed: de ltar na yang med pa'i yul can gyi sgra thob pa kho na yin no //

original: ci ste nyes pa 'dir ma gyur cig snyam pas 'brel pa med do zhes bya ba blos yul du byed par mi 'dod na /
analyzed: ci ste nyes pa 'dir ma gyur cig snyam pas 'brel pa med do zhes bya ba blos yul du byed par mi 'dod na /

analyzed: de'i tshe 'di na bum pa med do zhes bya ba 'di la gang 'gog par byed pa de la yul la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: then in the statement â€œThere is no pot here,â€ what is it that is negated? It is not the object, etc.,

original: de ni yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni yod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because they exist.

original: 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa ni ma yin te /
