original: de'i byed pa mi 'dzin pa'i phyir gang de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i byed pa mi 'dzin pa'i phyir gang de ni ma yin no //
translated: because it is not apprehended as the action of that.

original: gzhan yang med pa brjod par bya ba smra ba gang yin pa de brjod pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang med pa brjod par bya ba smra ba gang yin pa de brjod pa ste /
translated: Moreover, the statement â€œThe nonexistent is to be expressedâ€ is a statement.

original: med par brjod par smra ba 'di med par brjod par bya ba ma yin zhes lan 'debs pa ni mi smra ba na ji @212b ltar lan gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: med par brjod par smra ba 'di med par brjod par bya ba ma yin zhes lan 'debs pa ni mi smra ba na ji @212b ltar lan gdab par bya ste /

analyzed: med pa'i sgra brjod pa med par ni de brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin par bstan par mi nus so //

analyzed: gang gi phyir med pa'i yul can gyi sgra de dag rnam par gcod pa ste /
translated: Because those words that have non-existent objects are eliminations,

translated: the expression of their nature in terms of engagement.ğŸ”½Are entities expressed in the manner of affirmation, or are they expressed in the manner of exclusion of other?

original: gzhan rnam par gcod pa brjod pa zhes dogs par 'gyur ba la /
analyzed: gzhan rnam par gcod pa brjod pa zhes dogs par 'gyur ba la /
translated: To address this doubt,

original: med pa ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid kho na yin ta zhes bya ba rang bzhin dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: med pa ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid kho na yin ta zhes bya ba rang bzhin dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: he says, â€œNon-existence is the mere characteristic of isolation,â€ the characteristic of being devoid of intrinsic nature.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyu mtshan du byas shing yul du bya ba'i ngo bo 'ga' zhig kyang med pa'i phyir ram de'i ngo bo ste /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan du byas shing yul du bya ba'i ngo bo 'ga' zhig kyang med pa'i phyir ram de'i ngo bo ste /
translated: Because there is no entity whatsoever that is taken as a reason and made into an object.

original: gzugs su yod pa la med pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs su yod pa la med pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not possible for non-existence to have the nature of existing as form.

original: de'i gzugs kyi ngo bo ni de'i ngo bo'o //
analyzed: de'i gzugs kyi ngo bo ni de'i ngo bo'o //
translated: The nature of its form is its nature.

original: ngo bo gang la de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: ngo bo gang la de nyid kyi mtshan nyid yod pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That which has the characteristic of that is called that.

original: 'di nyid dngos su dben pa ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid dngos su dben pa ste /
translated: This is the actual exclusion.

original: gzhan sal ba dngos po thams cad kyi stobs yin no //ğŸ”½dben pa de ni de lta bu'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan sal ba dngos po thams cad kyi stobs yin no // dben pa de ni de lta bu'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa ste /
translated: The other exclusion is the power of all things.ğŸ”½That exclusion is the nature of the expression.

original: dben pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i ngo bo rjod par byed pa'o //
translated: It is the nature of the expression of exclusion.

original: dben pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can no //
analyzed: dben pa'i yul zhes bya ba ni gzhan sel ba'i yul can no //
translated: The object of exclusion is the subject of exclusion.

original: rnam par rtog pa dag kyang dben pa'i yul can zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dag kyang dben pa'i yul can zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The conceptual thoughts also have the object of exclusion.

original: dngos po gcig ni ldog pa la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po gcig ni ldog pa la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: One thing becomes based on the negation.

original: gang gi rjes su 'brangs shing brten pa'i sgra dang rnam par rtog pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi rjes su 'brangs shing brten pa'i sgra dang rnam par rtog pa de dag la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The words and conceptual thoughts that follow and depend on that are called that.

original: de dag ni sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag go //
analyzed: de dag ni sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag go //
translated: Those are the words and conceptual thoughts.

original: 'di ltar ma byas pa rnam par bcad nas /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma byas pa rnam par bcad nas /
translated: In this way, having eliminated the non-done,

original: dngos po byas pa'i sgra'am rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de nyid mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa'i sgra'am rnam par rtog pa dag kyang /
analyzed: dngos po byas pa'i sgra'am rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de nyid mi rtag pa dang bdag med pa la sogs pa'i sgra'am rnam par rtog pa dag kyang /
translated: The sound or conceptual thought that is produced in regard to a thing is also the sound or conceptual thought of impermanence, selflessness, and so on.

original: de dag de lta bur gyur pa yin na yang tha dad pa'i yul can kho na yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de dag de lta bur gyur pa yin na yang tha dad pa'i yul can kho na yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: Even though they are like that, they are only subjects that are differentiated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, â€œjust as they are, etc.â€

original: gang zhig ldog pa gang las rnam par gzhag pa de ni de'i khyad par yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig ldog pa gang las rnam par gzhag pa de ni de'i khyad par yin te /
translated: That which is posited as the exclusion of something is its difference.

original: dper na byas pa zhes bya ba rnam par gcad pa'i ma byas pa'i lta bu dang / de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par gcad pa'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na byas pa zhes bya ba rnam par gcad pa'i ma byas pa'i lta bu dang / de bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par gcad pa'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the exclusion of the non-produced is called â€œproduced,â€ and the exclusion of permanence, etc. is impermanence, etc.

original: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par dag ni tha dad pa ni /
analyzed: bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khyad par dag ni tha dad pa ni /
translated: The differences just as they are are differentiated.

original: tha dad pa de dag gis nye bar btags pa mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i dben pa dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i khyad par de rnams kyis tha dad pa can dag bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i blo la so sor snang zhing so sor gsal ba'i
analyzed: tha dad pa de dag gis nye bar btags pa mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'i dben pa dag phan tshun tha dad pa'i khyad par de rnams kyis tha dad pa can dag bzhin du rnam par rtog pa'i blo la so sor snang zhing so sor gsal ba'i
translated: The difference of the various exclusions of impermanence, etc., which are predicated of the different things, appears to the conceptual cognition as if it were different, and it is manifested as if it were different.

original: dben pa de dag la sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag nye bar gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dben pa de dag la sgra dang rnam par rtog pa dag nye bar gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the word and the conceptual cognition are present in the exclusions,

original: go rims bzhin du brjod nyid dang // 'dzin pa po nyid du nye bar 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du brjod nyid dang // 'dzin pa po nyid du nye bar 'dren pa'i phyir ro //
translated: respectively, they are drawn to the expression and the apprehender.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i khyad par @213b ji skad du bshad pas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi rang bzhin nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bo yin du zin kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni ldog pa'i khyad par @213b ji skad du bshad pas rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs kyi rang bzhin nyid ni bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i ngo bo yin du zin kyang bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa
translated: Therefore, the difference of the exclusions, as it has been explained, is the nature of the natural reason, even though it is the nature of the probandum and the probans.

original: dag gcig pa nyid du 'dres par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dag gcig pa nyid du 'dres par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: However, the probandum and the probans are not mixed up as being identical.

original: de bas na rang bzhin sgrub par bya ba dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa la /
analyzed: de bas na rang bzhin sgrub par bya ba dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro zhes gang smras pa la /
translated: Therefore, the one part of the meaning of the thesis that is to be established is the reason.

original: nyes pa de yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: nyes pa de yod pa ma yin no zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the fault stated does not exist,

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //

original: de'i rang bzhin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin zhes bya bar sbyar ro //

original: gtan tshigs nyid du bstan pa ni brjod pa na'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du bstan pa ni brjod pa na'o //

original: khyad par bye brag la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: khyad par bye brag la ltos pa ste /

original: khyad par tha dad pa ltos pa can la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: khyad par tha dad pa ltos pa can la brjod par bya'o //

original: ci'i phyir brjod par bya zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir brjod par bya zhe na /

analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //

original: gnyi ga dpe yang 'ga' zhig la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gnyi ga dpe yang 'ga' zhig la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: â€œBothâ€ is stated in the example.

original: mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la byas pa nyid de'i 'bras bu nyid de ni byed pa'i bye brag la ltos pa can yin la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la byas pa nyid de'i 'bras bu nyid de ni byed pa'i bye brag la ltos pa can yin la /

analyzed: de la ltos pa med pa ni yod pa nyid yin no //

analyzed: rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pas byas pa nyid ni khyad par gyi bye brag la ltos par bstan to //
translated: By â€œown nature,â€ etc., it is shown that being a product depends on the distinction of the qualifier.

original: dngos por gyur pa'i rang gi ngo bor grub pa las gzhan te /
analyzed: dngos por gyur pa'i rang gi ngo bor grub pa las gzhan te /
translated: It is other than the established own nature of the thing.

original: gtan tshigs nyid du mngon par 'dod pa'i skyed par nus pa kho na gzhan gyi byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid du mngon par 'dod pa'i skyed par nus pa kho na gzhan gyi byed pa yin la /

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid ni ltos pa yin no /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid ni ltos pa yin no /

analyzed: rang gi ngo bo bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir te /

original: rang gi ngo bo bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi phyir ngo bo gang gis gzhan gyi byed pa la ltos pa de ni byas pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo bsgrub par bya ba'i rgyu mtshan gyi phyir ngo bo gang gis gzhan gyi byed pa la ltos pa de ni byas pa yin no //

original: gang gi phyir de ltar yin pa de bas na byas pa'i sgra 'dis gzhan gyi khyad par can gyis rang bzhin brjod pa yod pas kyang rang gi ngo bo 'di 'phangs pa yin no /

original: des ni zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid kyi khyad par bye brag la ltos pa nyid du bstan pas ni rkyen te rkyen rnams kyi bye brag yin pa des tha dad pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: des ni zhes bya ba ni byas pa nyid kyi khyad par bye brag la ltos pa nyid du bstan pas ni rkyen te rkyen rnams kyi bye brag yin pa des tha dad pa'i ngang tshul can du 'gyur ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni /
translated: â€œBy thatâ€ refers to the fact that the particularity of being produced is taught to be dependent on a specific condition. By that, the nature that is characterized by a different condition becomes

analyzed: rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa can nyid de /
translated: that which is different by virtue of the particularity of the condition.

analyzed: gnas dang stsol ba la sogs pa'i rgyu'i bye brag gi tha dad pa can gyi sgra'o //

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni bstsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid la sogs pa bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni bstsal ma thag tu byung ba nyid la sogs pa bshad pa yin te /
translated: The term â€œand so onâ€ explains that it is produced immediately after the effort and so on.

original: @214a * // de dag kyang gtan tshigs kyi bya ba'i khyad par la ltos pa can gyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: @214a * // de dag kyang gtan tshigs kyi bya ba'i khyad par la ltos pa can gyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Those are also natures that are dependent on the particularity of the activity of the reason.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni mjug sdud pa yin te /
translated: concludes.

original: 'ga' zhig tu ste sbyor ba la khyad par gyi bye brag la ltos pa med pa yin pa de nyid kyi phyir spyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu ste sbyor ba la khyad par gyi bye brag la ltos pa med pa yin pa de nyid kyi phyir spyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In some cases, i.e., in the application of the reason, there is no regard for the particular of the specific.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bos tshig gnyis yin la /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bos tshig gnyis yin la /
translated: For that very reason, he says in general, i.e., in general, the reason is stated in two ways, by the nature of cause and effect.

original: dper na mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la yod pa nyid du lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la yod pa nyid du lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof of impermanence, existence is the reason.

original: rang bzhin du 'gyur ba yang de yin la chos kyi bye brag kyang yin pas na zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin du 'gyur ba yang de yin la chos kyi bye brag kyang yin pas na zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The compound svabhÄva-viÅ›eá¹£a is to be resolved as follows: it is a svabhÄva, and it is a viÅ›eá¹£a, a particular of a property.

original: de yongs su gzung ba'i sgo nas 'ga' zhig tu rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs brjod par bya ba'i skabs yin no //
analyzed: de yongs su gzung ba'i sgo nas 'ga' zhig tu rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs brjod par bya ba'i skabs yin no //
translated: In some cases, the occasion is to state a reason by svabhÄva, by taking that as the subject.

original: dper na de nyid la zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la skyes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na de nyid la zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba la skyes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, in the proof of impermanence, arising is the reason.

original: 'di ltar skye ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid du zin kyang /
analyzed: 'di ltar skye ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid du zin kyang /
translated: Thus, although it is a svabhÄva, i.e., a reason by nature,

original: skye ba ni chos kyi bye brag nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir chos kyi bye brag nyid du rtogs kyi /
analyzed: skye ba ni chos kyi bye brag nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir chos kyi bye brag nyid du rtogs kyi /
translated: Birth is understood as a particular quality of a dharma, and so it is realized as a particular quality of a dharma.

original: yod pa nyid dang 'dra bar dag pa'i rang gi ngo bo tsam ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa nyid dang 'dra bar dag pa'i rang gi ngo bo tsam ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not realized as the mere intrinsic reality of a pure entity, as is the case with existence.

analyzed: 'di yang khyad par la ltos pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du blta bar bya'o //
translated: And this should be seen as a nature that depends on a distinction.

original: byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ba'i khyad par yin la /
analyzed: byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ba'i khyad par yin la /
translated: Being produced, etc., are distinctions of a transformation.

original: 'dir ni bdag nyid du 'gyur ba nyid kyi chos kyi bye brag yin no zhes bya ba de tsam ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: 'dir ni bdag nyid du 'gyur ba nyid kyi chos kyi bye brag yin no zhes bya ba de tsam ni khyad par ro //
translated: Here, a particular quality of a dharma is a transformation of itself. That is the distinction.

original: phyogs 'dis zhes bya ba ni khyad par la ltos pa dang mi ltos pa'i gtan tshigs kyis rab tu dbye ba'i phyogs kyis so //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis zhes bya ba ni khyad par la ltos pa dang mi ltos pa'i gtan tshigs kyis rab tu dbye ba'i phyogs kyis so //
translated: By this position, by the position that distinguishes between a reason that depends on a distinction and one that does not.

original: spyir chos can grub pa khyad par 'ga' zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: spyir chos can grub pa khyad par 'ga' zhig bsgrub par bya ba yin la /

original: chos can yang yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'o //
analyzed: chos can yang yod pa nyid du bsgrub par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa'o //

original: de la gal te yod pa nyid ces bya ba'i rang bzhin ni yod pa kho na zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de la gal te yod pa nyid ces bya ba'i rang bzhin ni yod pa kho na zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

original: de ldog pa'i don du yod pa nyid smos so //
analyzed: de ldog pa'i don du yod pa nyid smos so //

original: 'ga' zhig ldog pa yod pa nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir rang bzhin smos te /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig ldog pa yod pa nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir rang bzhin smos te /

analyzed: bdag nyid du 'gyur ba'i yod pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //

original: gal te gtan tshigs yod rang bzhin yin na /
analyzed: gal te gtan tshigs yod rang bzhin yin na /

analyzed: ci ltar yod pa bsgrub bya min te /

original: bsgrub byar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgrub byar yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: yod pa nyid kyi khyad par bsgrub par bya ba yin la /

analyzed: de'i tshe gtan tshigs yod pa nyid yang khyad par gyi rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dpe gtan tshigs kyis stong par 'gyur ro //

original: de'i khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
analyzed: de'i khyad par zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
translated: He says, â€œIts qualifier,â€ and so on.

original: khyad par te bye brag rnams nyams shing nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyad par te bye brag rnams nyams shing nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The qualifiers, the distinctions, would be impaired and would be faulty.

original: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dag la yang //
analyzed: gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dag la yang //
translated: â€œAlso with respect to the reason and the probandum,â€

original: zhes bya ba yang 'dun pa'i tshig gnyis pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba yang 'dun pa'i tshig gnyis pa yin te /
translated: is a second instance of the particle api.

original: gtan tshigs dang bsgrub par bya ba dag la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gtan tshigs dang bsgrub par bya ba dag la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is â€œwith respect to the reason and the probandum.â€

original: gzhan gyis ni bdag med pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni bdag med pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: The other is selflessness, and so on.

original: de zhes pa ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de zhes pa ni yod pa ma yin no //

original: de ltar rab tu sgrub pas na //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu sgrub pas na //
translated: Thus, it is established.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /

original: gtso bo yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtso bo la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i khyad par du 'gyur na /
analyzed: gtso bo yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pas gtso bo la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i khyad par du 'gyur na /

original: khyad par yang bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par yang bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: But a distinction cannot be established.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: khyad par de la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par de la rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //

original: de skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po ste /
analyzed: de skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po ste /
translated: â€œThusâ€ and so on is the master DignÄga.

original: grangs can gyi gtso bo yod do zhes bya ba 'dis gtso bo'i rang gi mtshan nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes gang smra ba de nyid dang ldan pa'i khyad par du 'gyur na zhes ston to //
analyzed: grangs can gyi gtso bo yod do zhes bya ba 'dis gtso bo'i rang gi mtshan nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes gang smra ba de nyid dang ldan pa'i khyad par du 'gyur na zhes ston to //
translated: He teaches that if someone says, â€œBy the statement â€˜pradhÄna exists,â€™ the intrinsic identity of pradhÄna is established,â€ then it would be a distinction that has that.

analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni spyi'i yul can yin gyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyi yul can ni ma yin no //

analyzed: skyon ni nyes pa yin te 'on kyang gtan tshigs la yang skyon mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //

analyzed: de nyid ni gtan tshigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /

analyzed: gtan tshigs 'di la rjes su 'gro ba med pa na rjes su 'gro ba med pa can no //
